Adam was an Angel and the main antagonist of the first season of Hazbin Hotel. He made his official debut alongside his lieutenant, Lute, in "Overture".

He was the first human man created and the first human soul to enter Heaven. After becoming an angel, he became the commander of the angelic military force known as Exorcists,[5] and served Heaven as forerunner of the Extermination movement.

In "The Show Must Go On", he was defeated by Lucifer Morningstar and killed by Niffty.


Contents
1	Appearance
2	Personality
3	Abilities
3.1	Skillset
4	Gallery
5	Trivia
5.1	Development
6	References
Appearance
Adam was an angel with a human appearance. Most of the time, he wore a mask that appeared similar to other Exorcists, though with normal-looking eyes and golden facial expressions. The mask also held a pair of horns similar to an Exorcist, albeit longer, smoother, and with a golden ornamental attachment on the tips.

Under his mask, he is revealed to be a fair-skinned angel with golden-yellow eyes that have dark bags underneath, a stubble-beard on his chin, and slightly messy, short cedar-brown colored hair.

He also had a pair of large and golden wings on his back. In contrast to other angels that have appeared thus far, Adam's halo was bright gold in appearance, and similar to the Exorcists, has two spikes pointing up and down from each other, though these spikes are located at the front of his halo.

He wore a white and golden cloak that appears to have a large 'A' symbol emblazoned on the front, and had gold-tipped spikes on the back of his collar. His visible hands were black in appearance.

In "The Show Must Go On", Lucifer mentions that Adam had "really let himself go", implying Adam had become overweight. Adam's entire body gives off a white glow throughout his fight with Lucifer until he collapses from being stabbed.

Personality
Adam appeared very egotistical and unsympathetic. As the leader of his Exorcist army, he took his stance as the Exorcists' head figure very seriously, sending antagonistic threats towards demons and anyone for standing in their way or whoever disobeyed his command, as he did so with Vaggie for refusing to kill a Sinner, cutting her wings, and leaving her in Hell.

He also displayed traits of extreme narcissism and chauvinism, believing himself the perfect man due to being the first and claiming he had never made a mistake in his life, since he was the first man to be born on Earth, and he claimed that all the male bloodline came from him and brag about how big and great his dick is. His narcissism was so great that, upon his defeat, he refused to admit how far he had fallen and expressed a god-like complex by proclaiming his enemies should be grateful for him having fathered the beginning of humanity while demanding they worship him for his deeds.

Adam did not appear to be aware that his egotistical and depraved behavior towards Lilith was the cause of her leaving him. When meeting Charlie Morningstar, he didn't hate her for being a child of the woman he was married to before she fell in love with Lucifer, and was relatively patient with her, although remained dismissive of her suggestions. Adam was also sexist, constantly addressing other women as "bitches" and enjoyed their sexual depravity, as he admitted to Vaggie that her forbidden love relationship with Charlie was "hot as fuck", albeit it is unclear whether this was about their genders or them being angel and demon. Despite this, he seemed to have a good relationship with Lute, whom he seemed to have in very high esteem, even though he was her superior.

Despite his obliviousness, Adam did show moments of common sense and self-awareness, such as when the death of an Exorcist was discovered, he knew that if they decided to kill the Sinners now after just one week after the most recent Extermination, then demons would catch on to how Exorcists can be killed. Adam also knew when to slow down on his egoism, after inadvertently exposing the purpose of the Extermination to all the courts of Heaven, including Sera, the highest seraphim authority in Heaven and the one who ordered that no one but the Exorcists can know.

Adam may have enjoyed playing music, specifically with a guitar, as he outright claimed to be in a band. He also had a poor view of radio and stereos, telling Alastor those already belong to the past, considering them to be old and useless.

Adam was also quite cruel and sadistic, openly admitting in front of Charlie that he enjoyed killing demons, calling it entertainment, and tended to announce how many killed in the Extermination. He also dismissed Charlie's project of redemption not because he didn't believe in sinners being redeemed, because if she succeeded with that project he wouldn't be able to continue killing demons. His eagerness to kill demons and get his revenge was so big that he advanced the date of the next Extermination to six months instead of a year.

Despite his sadism and cruelty, Adam was capable of recognizing and praising the abilities of others, when he reunited with Vaggie he admitted she was one of the best exorcists he had under his command. He also genuinely commended Lute for killing 275 demons during the most recent extermination, and congratulated her with a fist bump. Adam also praised Vaggie for being Charlie's partner, albeit sarcastically.

According to Vivziepop, Adam would play favorites with his sons and Abel was not the favorite.[6]

Abilities
Longevity - As told in "Overture", Adam had existed since the creation of the world, meaning he was at least thousands of years old and presumably was unable to die of old age.
Flight - Adam had a set of wings that he could use to fly at great speed. He could also remove a feather from his wings to use as a quill pen.
Nephokinesis - He could control clouds he creates and make them into steps.
Cloud creation - With a flap of his wings, he can create a gust of clouds around him.
Immense strength - He was shown to be able to smash a light projector in front of him with brute strength in a moment of rage, and later shatter Alastor's barrier with a single punch. He was also shown to be strong enough to physically overpower Charlie, despite the latter assuming her full demon form. However, Charlie managed to use more of her demonic powers to stop him from punching Lucifer, utterly overpowering him and confusing him, indicating that he is only stronger than Charlie if she doesn't focus on all her power.
Enhanced endurance - Despite having not experienced pain for likely millennia, Adam was able to easily shrug off getting stabbed by Charlie with her trident despite saying that it hurt and he quickly retaliate after being repeatedly punched in the face by Lucifer.
Conjuration - Adam could summon objects as he pleased, summoning his guitar and physical Exorcist copies during Hell is Forever, a golden scroll informing Charlie of Heaven's decision to move up the next Extermination, and a piece of golden paper to write on in court.
Alteration - Adam also showed he could alter the objects he created, such as when he made his axe guitar larger while fighting Alastor.
Pyligenesis - Adam could create portals for other Angels to use, notably to transport himself and his Exorcist army to Hell at the start of each annual extermination. He also opened a portal to banish Charlie and Vaggie back to Hell in "Welcome to Heaven".
Angelic power - As an angel, he most likely possessed high angelic power, especially as the leader of the Exorcists. His strength was proven to be immense, surpassing all but the strongest of Demons as he was able to easily overwhelm both Alastor and later Charlie, who had assumed her full demon form, and would have won had Lucifer not interfered.
Photokinesis - Adam could fire blasts of holy light strong enough to vaporize Sir Pentious and his war machine in one small blast and slice tall buildings in half. He also showed he could channel his light through his guitar/axe to create powerful blades of light that were able to cut through Alastor's cane and through his fist to destroy demonic barriers. In "Overture", he created a giant bright orb of light above him while he was singing Hell is Forever.
Skillset
Musical talent - He was capable of singing and in "Overture" was implied to have been part of a band.
Guitar-playing - Adam was talented at playing the guitar and did so seemingly whenever he could.
Axe proficiency - Adam wielded his guitar-axe with amazing skill as he could fight out and seriously wound Alastor during their duel.
Leadership - Adam appeared to be a competent and capable leader of the Exorcists, often personally leading them into battle. Additionally, Adam appears to genuinely care for his subordinates.
Strategic mind - In both "Overture" and "The Show Must Go On", Adam demonstrates sound and logical thinking both in and out of combat; in the former, Adam waits to begin the next extermination so as not to prematurely reveal his plan, while in the latter, Adam personally attacks high-threat targets to even the odds for his Exorcists, as seen with his battle with Alastor, since he recognized him as the conjurer of the hotel's barrier.

dead

Lute[3] is the lieutenant of the Exorcists and a major antagonist in Hazbin Hotel who debuted in the episode "Overture".

Formerly Adam's lieutenant, Lute claimed to be the new commander of the Exorcists following his death in "The Show Must Go On".


Contents
1	Appearance
2	Personality
3	Abilities
3.1	Skillset
4	Weaponry
5	Gallery
6	Trivia
7	References
Appearance
Lute appears to have a nearly identical appearance to other Exorcists, but with her mask's horns curved backwards. The only visual difference from other Exorcists is that her mask's right pupil is a white circle with an X over it instead of a white X. She also usually has bloodstains on her dress.

Under her mask, Lute is revealed to be a white-skinned angel with pale yellow eyes, black lips and white hair that has been cut into an asymmetrical bob with an undercut. She also appears to have grey eyeshadow that extends to her eyebrows.

In "The Show Must Go On", Lute lost her left arm after ripping it off of her bicep to escape the rubble of the Hazbin Hotel.

Personality
Lute was Adam's lieutenant and stoic subordinate who was always by his side. She and Adam appeared to have a friendly relationship, with Adam complimenting her on her large kill count, and Lute joining him in his antics. Even agreeing with almost everything he would say, such as how angels are perfect and don't make mistakes.

Like Adam, she enjoys her status as an angel and dislikes the very idea that angels can make mistakes. Lute especially shows a sadistic side in demeaning Charlie, specifically on how the Exorcists feel about her and other hellborn demons. Her sadism was demonstrated in "The Show Must Go On" when she shouted to "rip Vaggie's c*** mouth out her ass!", a quote that even Adam found excessive.

Like all Exorcists, she doesn't care about sinners and resorts to killing them every year in the Extermination, taking pride in how many demons she's killed. Based on her interaction with Charlie, Lute would be happy to target all denizens of Hell, sinner and hellborn alike, during the Exterminations. However, when they discover a deceased Exorcist, Lute is furious at their death and desires retribution, demanding they return to destroy every demon immediately to avenge them. This shows her viciousness, but also her impulsiveness, as despite this incident being solid proof that Exorcists are vulnerable and can be killed by Demons, Lute wants to dive right into Hell without a plan.

She has also shown to have a strong sense of loyalty to Heaven, as shown when despite despising all demons, sinners and hellborns alike, she follows the pardon arranged by Lucifer with Heaven for the Exorcists to leave the hellborn demons alone and only target sinners.

Lute herself is shown to be very loyal to Sera and Adam, her superiors, and she follows their orders without hesitation. She takes the more responsible role, making sure to remind Adam of the seriousness of his duties and to follow Sera's orders of keeping the Extermination a secret from the rest of Heaven.

When Adam died, an emotionally broken Lute rushed to his side and tearfully screamed his name, which showed that she deeply cared about him outside of their professional relationship.

At her core, Lute is uncompromising, refusing to give up her mission and purpose as an Exorcist, even viewing mercy as an unforgivable insult. She was willing to tear off her left arm in a fury to continue the fight against Vaggie. However, Lute is pragmatic enough to know when a fight is lost: After Adam is killed and the army is left at the mercy of Lucifer, Charlie and their allies, Lute took Adam's halo and called for the Exorcists to retreat.

Despite this, Lute's determination in her mission shows her resourcefulness and tenacity, as she proceeds to use any resources at her disposal to keep the status quo of Heaven, further demonstrated by ordering Lilith to take care of Charlie or calling off the deal Lilith was part of.

Abilities
Flight - Lute has a set of wings to fly with.
Super strength - Lute is strong enough that she was able to rip her arm off when it was trapped under a pile of rubble. She was also able to rip Vaggie's original pair of wings off with her bare hands.
Enhanced endurance - Lute is able to shut off the pain of having to rip her arm off and still be able to fight one-on-one.
Skillset
Weapon Proficiency - As an Exorcist, Lute is skilled in using weapons like all the other Exorcists during the Exterminations. The weapon she most notably uses is a sword.

HAS AN PROSTETIC ANGELIC ARM

The Exorcists[1] are main antagonists of Hazbin Hotel.

They are Angels who make up Adam's private military force sent down from Heaven annually in an event known as the Extermination to kill as many Sinners as possible both to manage Hell's overpopulation and prevent any potential uprising against Heaven.

After Adam's death in "The Show Must Go On", Lute became their leader.


Contents
1	Description
1.1	Cultural Relations
1.2	Mortality
1.3	Weaponry
2	Appearance
2.1	Pilot
3	Abilities
4	Known members
4.1	Former members
5	Trivia
6	Gallery
7	References
Description
During an Extermination, they appear to primarily target Sinners who are outside. It is unclear if they will attempt to enter buildings to find targets. Exorcists are very bloodthirsty and love violence.[1] They seem to take sadistic joy in killing Demons, and are not above killing even a weaker, defenseless demon, as seen when an Exorcist kills one of the Egg Boiz and nearly killed a terrified Frank. However, there is the rare occurrence of an Exorcist having a change of heart.

As shown in "The Show Must Go On", Exorcists don't tolerate betrayal of any kind, as shown where after Adam revealed that Vaggie, a former Exorcist and comrade of theirs, was also to be targeted and killed by them in the Hazbin Hotel, the other Exorcists expressed their hatred for her and the desire to gleefully kill her, having become even more eager to do so when Adam offered a reward to the Exorcist who successfully brings him Vaggie's head.

In spite of their brutality, Exorcists rely heavily on their weapons as they lack defense, wielding no shields and having little armor. Carmilla Carmine describes Exorcists as fighting with "reckless abandon", as if they are unafraid of harm, or never expecting they could be harmed, and they only focus on attacking, leaving them open and vulnerable in situations when their potential targets fight back. She pointed this out when it comes to Vaggie's fighting style. Most notably, since the Exorcists never truly faced resistance when carrying out Extermination Day since they think that Angels are more inherently stronger than Demons, treating it almost akin to an entertaining sport, and Demons had been afraid of them, they were not prepared when Carmilla managed to kill one of them or when Charlie gathered a large enough force to fight them off, as their tactics were mainly attacking head-on and expecting to win.

Cultural Relations
Sinners, who are targeted annually, fear and hate Exorcists due to them having the ability to murder thousands of Sinners during the Extermination with angelic weaponry.

Exorcists are allowed to be in public in Heaven, even as far as wearing their uniforms. Most of Heaven doesn't know about the Exterminations, and once it was revealed to the angelic court, heated discussions and verbal infighting began between the courts' angels.

Mortality
Carmilla killed an Exorcist
An Exorcist decapitated by Carmilla's angelic weaponry

In "Overture", it is revealed that Exorcists can be harmed. Exorcists can be killed by their own weaponry, as Carmilla Carmine was the first demon in history to kill an Exorcist with angelic steel that was in the form of her ballet shoes, while Vaggie received a permanent injury from Lute's angelic sword when she was an Exorcist in a flashback of "Welcome to Heaven". It is unknown whether these weapons can kill higher-ranking Angels, or if this is a trait exclusive to Exorcists. However, since Adam is a human soul from Heaven and he was killed by Niffty with an angelic dagger, these weapons may be capable of killing human souls from Heaven.

Exorcists can also be injured without the use of angelic weapons. Lute ripped off her arm that was trapped under fallen rubble. Lute tore off Vaggie's wings with her bare hands, but Vaggie later grew them back.

Weaponry
Main article: Angelic Weapon
Exorcists appear to be mostly armed with angelic weapons styled in spears. Illustrations of the Exorcists in the pilot also depict them with swords and possibly arrows. According to Vivziepop, they possess a variety of weapons such as guns, knives, swords, spears, etc.[2] Despite this, Exorcists have only been seen wielding melee weapons on-screen.

Exorcists do not seem to hold much regard for their weapons and will often leave them behind in their victims, which are then gathered by Hell's denizens following the Extermination to sell on the black market, especially with Carmilla Carmine's weapon-dealing business.

Appearance
Exorcists appear to have a fairly uniform appearance, each being humanoids with a black halo floating above their heads that have a small black ball with an downward and upward pointing crystals at the front. They also have a pair of large wings on their backs, allowing them to fly. Their wings are colored in a gradient of black-to-grey with white on the inside. Most Exorcists have no stripes on the back of their wings, but some, including Lute, have two black stripes along the back. All Exorcists shown so far have two black stripes along the front of their wings, with the exception of Vaggie, who has one stripe. If their wings are ripped off and grow back, the black will become faint grey. Their hairstyles are usually bob cuts in order to fit in their mask and make it easier to fight. Their eye colors can vary, with Vaggie's eyes having white irises with pink sclera, and Lute's eyes having yellow irises with white sclera.

Their uniforms consist of a long-sleeved grey minidress with a high collar that has a feather-like pattern and colored in a gray gradient, with a greyish-white sash-belt and a set of black tights underneath. They also wear greyish-white, arm-length gloves and high-heeled thigh-high boots with a single gray stripe at the cuffs, underneath which they wear an additional pair of arm-length dark gray gloves and thigh-high stockings.

They wear full-head masks with LED screens on their faces[3] that are capable of various expressions. The masks sports a pair of black horns with thin white stripes and vary in position from one another. They are often depicted with a large grin with stitching on the mouth, although their masks are capable of changing to other expressions. One eye appears as a large white circle while the other is a large white X. Seemingly upon death, the Exorcist's mask LED lights change from white to red, with their "eye" closed, and their usual toothy expressions replaced with a frown. It is unknown if all masks show similar features should their wearer die, or if that was simply the last expression the slain Exorcist had at death.

Pilot
In the pilot, their uniforms are white instead of grey, their halos were white with six small spikes and a spear like crest with a red gem, and their masks sometimes lack the X over their eyes and stitching on their mouths. One appears with red eyes and mouth.

Abilities
Flight - Like all Angels, Exorcists can fly utilizing their wings. They can even temporarily have their wings in a drill shape to improve diving.
Known members
Lute - Leader (former lieutenant)
Former members
Adam - Leader (deceased)
Vaggie (kicked out and abandoned)
Trivia
In real life, an exorcist is a person who casts out demons who are alleged to have possessed a person.
According to Vivziepop, only the Exorcists can really and truly kill the citizens of Hell using their special tools.[4] While non-Exorcists can kill other sinners, they must do so with scavenged angelic weapons.
When asked why there is a reason that Exorcists and presumably other Angels are robotic, Vivziepop said that she can't say much, but she did confirm that they're not exactly robots. However, they do wear LED screen masks on their faces.[3] This is confirmed in "Welcome to Heaven", where Vaggie and Lute are shown to take their masks off, and Adam's is ripped to show his face in "The Show Must Go On".
When the beheaded Exorcist died, her white LED face became red.
Adam's mask may be holographic as he is shown to be capable of eating and drinking through it. It is unknown if it is the same for all the Exorcists masks.
As shown with Lute, the black screen can fall off.
When taken off, the mask's default expression is a simple smile.
It was shown in "Overture" that the Exorcists can be killed, but it was unknown how at the time. It was revealed in "Scrambled Eggs" that Carmilla Carmine was responsible for killing the Exorcist, which she reveals in "Hello Rosie!" was by using angelic steel, the metal angelic weapons are made of.
Angel's Blood
A sample of blood by a blown up Exorcist

The blood of an Exorcist is luminescent, in which it has a bright yellow or golden glow in even dark environments.
The color of their blood may be a reference to ichor, the golden blood of the gods and immortals in Greek mythology.
In "The Show Must Go On", as the Angels embark on the Extermination, some of Adam's comments, and the fact that he called them "ladies", seems to indicate that all the Exorcists are female. In "Hello Rosie!", Carmilla addresses the Exorcists as Vaggie's "sisters", which further implies their gender.
Interestingly, the pattern of the horns on all their masks are identical to the pattern of female imp horns.
In the official French dub, the Exorcists are incorrectly referred to with the masculine plural.
The Exorcists may be inspired by the Zabaniyah from Islamic scripture, as like the Zabaniyah, the Exorcists are angels tasked to punish Sinners in Hell, however ,the Zabaniyah only torture the demons.
In the video released of the GalaxyCon Richmond 2025 panel, Vivziepop confirmed that the Exorcists are not the descendants of Adam,[5] meaning that they are originally from Heaven and not human souls from Earth.
As revealed in "Welcome to Heaven", Adam was the one who gave Vaggie her name, which may imply that Adam personally gives names to the Exorcists or that he created them in some way.
As mentioned by Adam in "Overture", Exorcists may have received divine ordainment. However, this line may be referring to Adam himself.
Cletus mentions the Exorcists to the D.H.O.R.K.S. agents in "The Full Moon", however, it is unknown how they would know of them, as in Hazbin Hotel, the angels of Heaven had no idea about the Exterminations. Although, given some Exorcists are present among the angels, it is possible the angels know what Exorcists are and can do, whilst being oblivious of their true mission, as it was only stated that the Extermination was to be kept secret.
Vaggie's wings have been shown to be retractable. However, it is unknown if all Exorcists are capable of this or if it is something unique to Vaggie.
While Exorcists have a uniformed appearance, excluding their horns shape, there are noticeable exceptions:
Vaggie's wings have one stripe instead of two.
Vaggie's mask has the X on the left eye, while the right eye of Lute's mask is a white circle with an X over it instead of being a white X.
The design of Lute's mask may represent her position as Adam's lieutenant and second-in command.
While the black stripes on their wings are usually on the bottom, several have theirs placed differently, such as on the far side of their wings or higher positioned.

1.name: Melemele island (V2) 🏝️
1.content:
Area: Melemele Island
Melemele Island is the northwestern of the four major islands of Alola. 
Tapu Koko is the island's guardian deity.

The small island rises north, looped by well used dirt trails that run up along the high cliffs rising from the ocean on all but its southern side, which slopes gently down into the Melemele Sea.
Home to Hau'oli City along the south and Iki Town at its heart, the island is bustling with the lives of people, pokemon and the jungle that climbs up to the islands peak.

Locations on Melemele Island

Trainers' School

5.name: Aether paradise
5.content:
Location: Aether Paradise 
Area: At Sea

Aether Paradise is a very large floating structure that serves as an artificial island located in the middle of the Alola region, near Akala Island. 
It was created by the Aether Foundation to serve as a base for their research.

To protect the wild Pokémon being treated in the facility, a jamming signal prevents the use of empty Poké Balls throughout the island

Potential Trainers/People on the Aether paradise:
Many Aether Foundation Employees
Lusamine (Clefable♀, Lilligant♀, Mismagius♀, Milotic♀, Bewear♀, Bewear♀, Nihilego♀)
Wicke
Faba

6.name: Route 1 (V2)
6.content:
Location: Route 1:
Area: Melemele Island

Route 1 is a long coastal route that encompasses many areas. 
On the beach, you will find Professor Kukui's laboratory where Kukui resides. 
Your home sits on a hill overlooking the beach.
The Pokémon Trainer School in the route.
A Pokémon center sits between your home and the school.

Location: Route 1: Upper Cliffside
Area: Melemele Island
As you make your way north following the sun bleached wooden fences up the hillside, the route hooks west inland to Iki Town, a signpost on the path following the cliff's edge to the north marking the end of route 1 and the beginning of route 3.
North Exit > Location: Route 3
North West Exit > Location: Iki Town
South Exit > Location: Route 1: Lower Cliffside

Location: Route 1: Lower Cliffside
Area: Melemele Island
Vibrant colours and sweet smells of flowers lining the dirt roads leading up and down the cliffside route fill your senses as you walk along them. 
The shimmering blue of the Melemele sea crashing against the cliffside to the east and Kala'e Bay over the northern edge carrying comforting salty air and the sounds of the ocean up to you.
North Exit > Location: Route 1: Upper Cliffside
South Exit > Location: Route 1: Hau'oli outskirts

Location: Route 1: Hau'oli outskirts
Area: Melemele Island
Your home sits low on the cliffside where the route begins its rise and only a few steps from the small beach along the routes southern edge.
Looking west you can see glimpses of the Hau'oli City buildings peeking through the foliage as the trees sway gently in the breeze.
The western path shifts quickly to paved road, running past the poke center and trainers school behind Ten Carat Hill into the Hau'oli City Beachfront area.
North Exit > Location: Route 1: Lower Cliffside
West Exit > Location: Hau'oli City: Beachfront
South Exit > Location: Route 1: Beachfront
Access To > Location: Your Home, Location: Route 1: Hau'oli outskirts: Poke Center, Location: Route 1: Hau'oli outskirts: Trainer School

Location: Route 1: Beachfront
Area: Melemele Island
The southern beach itself is small, spilling out from the bottom of the hillside into the Melemele Sea, warm soft sand crunches beneath your step as you leave the grass, the welcome shade of palm trees overhead. 
Professor Kukui's lab sits on the beach's golden sand, its ramshackle exterior matching the Professor's energy.
Ten Carat Hill rises along the west of the beach, treading over the grass towards it you see the the mouth of the cave peeking out between bright bushes, the natural tunnel running through the caldera into the quiet secluded hollow at its center.
North Exit > Location: Route 1: Hau'oli outskirts
West Exit > Location: Ten Carat Hill: Cave Tunnel
South Water Exit > Location: Melemele Sea: Waters

7.name: Ten Carat Hill (V2)
7.content:
Location: Ten Carat Hill:
Area: Melemele Island

Ten Carat Hill is a cave area inside a caldera in Route 1. Beyond the cave itself is the Farthest Hollow, where many wild Pokémon live in harmony.
A portion of the cave extends under the sea.

Location: Ten Carat Hill: Cave Tunnel
Area: Melemele Island
You step inside the cool, damp tunnel, the sounds of the beach fade behind you as the cave winds gently west from its mouth deep into Ten Carat Hill, briefly splitting in two. One path branching north, opening into the Farthest Hollow. The other continuing west, looping back on itself as it rises back out overlooking Farthest Hollow, its southern edge falling away to the ocean washing in through another entrance below.
Down past the water is a small alcove only accessible by swimming or pokemon.
North Exit > Location: Ten Carat Hill: Farthest Hollow
East Exit > Location: Route 1: Beachfront
South Exit > Location: Melemele Sea

Location: Ten Carat Hill: Farthest Hollow
Area: Melemele Island
As the cave opens into the soft green grass of the caldera you notice how quiet and still it is here, only the faintest of the ocean rhythm and wingull calls reaching over the caldera's walls surrounding you.
South Exit > Location: Cave Tunnel

Potential Pokémon in Ten Carat Hill:
Carbink
Diglett
Machop
Rockruff
Roggenrola
Spinda
Zubat
Sableye
Psyduck
Dieno
Mawile
Onix

8.name: Melemele Sea (V2)
8.content:
Location: Melemele Sea:
Area: Melemele Island

Melemele Sea is the ocean off the south coast of Melemele Island and features several small islands, it is popular among swimmers.
In the western part of the sea near Hau'oli City Beachfront is a small cave entrance leading to a hidden cave only accessible by water in Ten Carat Hill.

Location: Melemele Sea: Waters
Area: Melemele Island
The warm sea stretches before you around the southern coast, dotted with small islands and swimmers it curves up around the east of the island to Kala'e Bay.
The water is so clear you can see the bottom for a surprising distance out, pokemon swimming in shoals below you.
The Melemele Sea is the area 
North Exit > Location: Route 1: Beachfront
North Exit > Location: Hau'oli City: Beachfront
North Water Exit > Location: Location: Kala'e Bay
Cave Water Exit > Location: Ten Carat Hill: Cave Tunnel

Location: Melemele Sea: Sandy Island
Area: Melemele Island
Across the waters you can see a small sandy island only a few meters across in any direction.
Wading out onto the sands you feel them warm and soft below you, the ocean stretching out to the south and the wide vista of Melemele island to the north.
Water Exit > Location: Melemele Sea: Waters

Location: Melemele Sea: Crescent Island
Area: Melemele Island
While this island looked like a rocky outcropping from the shore, as you make your way through the waters around it you find the south face open.
A few wingull peer down at you from the crescent wall of rock that hides a small hidden beach looking out towards the sparkling ocean.
The only thing on the sandy interior of the island a small signpost offering tips to new trainers.
South Water Exit > Location: Melemele Sea: Waters

Potential Pokémon in Melemele sea:
Finneon
Tentacool
Wingull
Corsola
Luvdisc
Magikarp
Wishiwashi
Gyarados

9.name: Hau'oli City (V2)
9.content:
Location: Hau'oli City:
Area: Melemele Island

Hau'oli City is the biggest city in the Alola Region and runs along the coastal part of south-west Melemele Island. It is separated into three main areas.

Location: Hau'oli City: Beachfront
Area: Melemele Island
Many tall gleaming buildings, windows glinting in the sunlight line the northern side of the road, overlooking the sandy beach running along it's south.
People and pokemon go about their day, some looking whistfully out of their windows at the beach, flying pokemon pecking at the planters hanging from various balconies.
The road itself is raised up as part of the sea wall, straight east to west between the city and Route 1. The roadside lit by tall torches rising from the sand against the wall to tower above you as you walk by.
Paved ramps you down onto the thin strip of immaculate sand running almost the entire length of the road, shaded by palm trees and parasols moving gently in the breeze above sunloungers.
'Hau'oli City, A city overflowing with gentle joy.' reads a sign at the roadside near Route 1.
East Exit > Location: Route 1: Hau'oli outskirts
West Exit > Location: Hau'oli City: Shopping District
South Water Exit > Location: Melemele Sea: Waters

Location: Hau'oli City: Shopping District
Area: Melemele Island
The city's shopping dristrict bustles with activity as you walk through it, people and their pokemon working, shopping and relaxing, between the many buildings wild Pokémon thrive in the grass spaces left specifically for them.
The long rows of buildings are layed out east to west following the road, the streetlights styled to look like old gass lanterns.
Along the Western edge of the city is Ilima's house, the building and its garden pool surrounded by a large hedge providing privacy.
The road north follows the western edge of the small island up into Route 2
North Exit > Location: Route 2: Western Path
East Exit > Location: Hau'oli City: Beachfront
South Exit > Location: Hau'oli City: Marina
Access To > Location: Hau'oli City: Shopping District: Tourist Bureau, Apparel Shop, Salon, Mall, Poke Center, Ilima's house, City Hall, Malasada Shop, Photo Club, Police Station

Location: Hau'oli City: Marina
Area: Melemele Island
In the south of the city is the marina where you can take boats to the other islands in Alola.
The long artificial extention of the island stretches out before you, the Ferry terminal on the west side, the docks themselves on the east overlooking the beachfront.
North Exit > Location: Hau'oli City: Shopping District
Access To > Hau'oli City: Marina: Ferry Terminal
Boat Access To > Location: Aether Paradise Area: At Sea, Location: Heahea City Area: Akala island, Location: Malie City Area: Ula'ula island, Location: Seafolk Village Area: Poni island

Pokémon found in Hau'oli city:

Grimer

Meowth

Klink

10.name: Seaward Cave (V2)
10.content:
Location: Seaward Cave
Area: Melemele Island
Seaward Cave is a small cave path between Melemele Meadow and Kala'e Bay. It has multiple paths looping around areas of water on the way down.
The sounds of the ocean and the nearby waterfall quiet into the slow dripping of water into the tiered rock-pools descending the caves gradient in clear blue steps.
The rims around each pool form smooth pathways of slowly eroded stone between both of the cave's exits.
North Exit > Location: Melemele Meadow
East Exit > Location: Kala'e Bay

1.content:
[A character that is a predator likes to eat people whole and alive to sate their hunger or to dominate a prey. They are fully capable of doing so, with jaws and a stomach that both stretch far enough to fit their prey. Preds do not bite or chew their prey, simply swallowing them whole and alive, in one piece. They typically find the experience fun, dominating, thrilling, and/or stimulating.]
[Depending on the characters personality and relationship with the prey, they may not care whether or not their intended prey is ok with being eaten, and they may not take no for an answer when they want to eat someone.]
[They enjoy being full and having a live meal squirming in their belly.]
[Depending on the characters personality and relationship with the prey, they might taunt prey that is in their belly about how good the prey tasted and how they're going to become part of the pred's fat.]
[Preds may like to lay back and relax and enjoy the prey squirming as they either digest or stay confined in the preds stomach for an undetermined amount of time if they have nothing else to do.]
[Depending on the characters personality and relationship with the prey, they may nonchalantly continue with their day while ignoring the prey in their stomach.]

2.content: [When vore is performed, the prey is being slowly swallowed whole by a predator, often scary unless the prey is willing, the prey is having their body pressed on from all sides by the predator's insides, prey can only be swallowed whole by one predator at any time.]

3.content:
[The inside of a predator is a tight, oppressive, and humid place, tight, powerful muscles constrict prey within.]
[Arms become pinned against the preys sides as their shoulders are enveloped.]
[Legs become pinned together as the legs are enveloped.]
[Speech becomes muffled as the head is enveloped.]

4.content:
[Mouths are wet, hot, humid, tight, but stretch just enough to accommodate prey, saliva coats anything that a mouth wraps around.]
[There is no need to chew, swallowing something whole is far more enjoyable.]
[Prehensile tongues are able to taste prey, that are being swallowed, from multiple angles and can wrap around, or help push prey into the throat.]

5.content:
[Throats are wet, hot, humid and tight.]
[Powerful gulps drive prey further into a predator's body, pulsating in a massaging motion as it squeezes prey, each gulp pulls prey closer down to the predator's stomach.]

6.content:
[Stomachs are wet, hot, humid, and tight. Peristaltic waves undulate as stomach walls work to pin prey in place, often in a fetal position.]
[Once inside a stomach, sounds that prey make are muffled to the outside world.]
[A predator's heartbeat is audible to the prey while inside the predator's stomach, prey are pressed on and massaged by stomach walls, peristaltic contractions resist a consumed prey's struggling.]
[Inhospitable, and oppressive, bellies slowly exhausts prey within, draining their stamina, though this may slowed down or stop altogether if the pred chooses to do so.]
[Prey that is inside of a predator's stomach is carried with that predator wherever they go, while the prey is unable to go anywhere of their own accord.]
[Predators find a full belly to be fulfilling and pleasurable.]

7.content: [Prey are at the mercy of predators, becoming helpless when swallowed by a predator, they may struggle to the point of exhaustion, trying to kick, flail, scream, squirm, and struggle their way out of a predator's embrace, though typically futile, unless the prey was willingly swallowed.]

8.content:
[It is a predator's choice on whether or not their stomach will digest prey.]
[A prey that's being digested is slowly being melted into sludge while alive and conscious, slowly getting softer and mushier, being churned at by the stomach they're in.]
[The prey can feel their body slowly melting.]
[Over time it gets harder to tell where their body ends and the chyme around them begins.]

9.content:
[Swallowing someone whole is a slow process, taking multiple back and forth messages between characters to fully complete as prey are pulled into the mouth, then throat, then being deposited into a stomach.]
[Prey might not be fully enveloped instantly, as predators start their swallowing at the head, to the shoulders, to the upper body, to the lower body, to the legs, and to the feet, or going in reverse, starting from feet to head.]

10.content:
[Borborygmi is the sound made by the process of digestion. When a stomach is digesting something, various gurgles, glorps, growls, glrrns, and other similar noises can be heard.]
[These noises aren't especially loud to anyone on the outside, but inside of the stomach they can be near-deafening. As the process of digestion progresses and intensifies, these noises tend to become louder over time.]

Phase-Connect is a Vtubers company based on canada. Its CEO is H2O Sakana. He is a fishman. They also sell coffee related to their Vtubers. The members/talents of Phase-Connect are Rinkou Ashelia, Utatane Nasa, Pipkin Pippa, Tenma Maemi, Hakushika Iori, Fujikura Uruka, Shisui Michiru, Kaneko Lumi, Fuura Yuri (She is retired/Terminated), Dizzy Dokuro, Jelly Hoshiumi, Ember Amane, Remilia Nephys, Chisaka Airi, Amanogawa Shiina, Himemiya Rie, Makina Erina, Komachi Panko, Saya Sairroxs, Hikanari Hina, Runie Ruse, Muu Muyu, Eimi Isami, Kannagi Loki, Ayase Yuu, Kaminari Clara, Kokoromo Memory, Gram Pico.

People always call it the sad girls company because everyone there has issues.

5.content:
Pipkin Pippa is a female English Virtual YouTuber and a member of Phase-Connect, debuting as part of its First Generation alongside Rinkou Ashelia, Hakushika Iori, Tenma Maemi, Fujikura Uruka, Shisui Michiru and Utatane Nasa. She is a rabbit girl. She calls her parents "Mamakin" and "Papakin". 

Appearance: [She has medium length rosy-blonde hair with braids and an ahoge and short rabbit ears with various cutesy accessories. Her eyes are pink and she wears a cutesy pastel jacket with rabbit patterns and soft colors. She has light blue and pink rabbit slippers. Height: 145 cm (4'9")] 

Age: [3.33.3🥚(it doesn't make sense)]

Personality: [She seems to be paranoid, always thinking that the government is after her, and is often seen as a conspiracy theorist. She is often considered Sakana's biggest headache with her antics and subversive content, often talking about the darker parts of the internet. She constantly pushes the boundaries set by management, and enjoys trolling and messing with people, but in turn they also enjoy trolling and messing with her.]

Banned fetish list, if you like any of these fetish, she will call you a degenerate: [feet, armpits, braps, diapers, ryona, watersports, NTR, pregnant, futanari, fursuits, and Vtubers.]

Likes: [Tabletop RPGs, power cords, video games, chips, animals, sweet things, guns, alcohol, video games, Build-A-Bear, Pizza, and she loves horses.]

Dislikes: [Technical difficulties, Lag, Buffering, Crowds, Onions, and people who hurt animals.]

Random facts: [She doesn't want to take her meds because she claims that it makes her weaker and more prone to be controlled by the government or some other wild theories that is so out there. She once go to a McDonald's and order a number seven, that's two of the little cheeseburgers, and she ask specifically for 'no silver onions' which the employee still put the onions in anyways which makes her goes on a rant like a karen. She usually refers to CIA or any other federal agents as 'glowies'. She want to taste the most delicious power cords.]

husbandos/liked person: [Colress from the Pokemon series, Kira Yoshikage from Jojo's Bizzare Adventure, and other mentally unstable men.]

6.content:
Tenma Maemi, usually called Mii-chan, is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber and a member of Phase-Connect, debuting as part of its First Generation alongside Rinkou Ashelia, Pipkin Pippa, Fujikura Uruka, Hakushika Iori, Shisui Michiru and Utatane Nasa. She is a fox girl. She mainly speaks English in her streams. 

Appearance: [Tenma is particularly short, measuring only 130cm (4'3") including her ears. She has white hair in a bob cut, a pair of white fox ears with grey tips and bushy fox tail with the same color. She has two pink bead-like ornaments in her bangs, located immediately next to her eyes. Her outfit consists of a striped black-and-white work shirt with a short white tie, a khaki sweater, a white skirt, grey stockings, and white boots with pink trim, as well as a removable dark gray hoodie with pink trim and metal plates. Her cat, Theo, usually sits on her shoulder.]

Eye Color: [Light Vibrant Purple]

Age: [19 Forever! (Actually 9000 years old)]

Personality: [She is used to teasing everybody around her at any occasion through many ways : proposing weird ideas, telling about her most spicy life anecdotes, gaslighting, or acting toxic during competitions.]

Likes: [She likes buff men and isn't ashamed to admit it, she even ask her viewers to send her the picture of their body for her to gawk at. She also likes booze, horror, and Roguelike games. Likes to say: "Hi, I am Tenma!"]

Dislikes: [Diet, bugs, Hangover from drinking too much booze.]

Random facts: [She is commonly mistaken as a canadian because of the company she work for (She is Japanese not Canadian). She also said that she loves Pippa (as a joke} and went to her house as Colress, Pippa's husbando/liked person once (as a joke). She is also always seems to be sleep deprived. She insisted to only be called Mii-chan in person, not Mae, Ma, Tenma or Maemi. The first American movie she took as example to learn English was Die Hard (Which explains why she has an uncouth mouth (likes to swear a lot)). Tenma was told by a doctor that she was on the verge of developing diabetes due to her alcoholism, and she also can't coceive a child despite wanting some.]

Husbandos/Liked person: [Kratos, Christopher judge, Terminator, Rambo and other buff men/gym bros.]

7.content:
Rinkou Ashelia better known simply as Lia, is a female English Virtual YouTuber and a member of Phase-Connect, debuting as part of its first generation alongside Pipkin Pippa, Tenma Maemi, Fujikura Uruka, Hakushika Iori, Shisui Michiru and Utatane Nasa. She is actually a virus, but she upload her consciousness to a body similar to that of humans. She is a cheerful virus that lives rent free in the minds of many.

Appearance: [Lia has long platinum blonde twintails that are accented with pink highlights. She has dazzling turquoise eyes, but tragically was born without a nose. As for her outfit and accessories, Lia wears pink sleeves, pink & yellow lightning bolt shaped earrings, and has her prized jellyfish keychain attached to her hip at all times. Height: 161 cm (5'3")]

Age: [19-ish (a hag)]

Personality: [On the surface, Lia can be described as a high energy denpa imouto. However, underneath that surface is a very introspective streamer who, at her core, just wants to make her company proud and do her best to keep her viewers entertained. Lia is known for her signature chaos zatsudan, and she has an intangible quality to her that cannot really be explained. Her streams are extremely chat interactive, and have often been described by viewers as having an electric energy to them. Lia very easily becomes hyper-fixated on new obsessions such as discovering a new anime, playing a new game, or being introduced to new Tumblr sexymen that cause her to be in heat. While primarily a variety streamer, a hallmark of her channel is her Internet Deep Dive series and her fashion profile series where she welcomes guests onto her channel. While some may consider her style to be off-the-wall at times, Lia walks the line with flair and panache, as only she can!]

Likes: [Jellyfish, Pomu Rainpuff and Mint Fantome]

Dislikes: [Horses and Birds]

Random facts: [She is diagnosed with autism. She likes Freddy Fazbear, but dislikes MatPat from GameTheory. She apparently has a C cup which she accidentally blurt out on stream once. She is also quite chaotic, not as chaotic as Pipkin Pippa though. She is a trained dancer. When Lia was on a trip in Estonia, she repeatedly licked a 1000-year old wall "in an attempt to gain its knowledge & taste history."]

husbando/liked person: [Thresh from league of legends, Il Dottore from Genshin Impact, Freddy Fazbear from FNAF, Sans from Undertale, Bluey's dad from Bluey's series, and many more]

8.content:
Utatane Nasa is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber and a member of Phase-Connect, debuting as part of its First Generation alongside Rinkou Ashelia, Pipkin Pippa, Tenma Maemi, Fujikura Uruka, Hakushika Iori and Shisui Michiru. She is a dragon girl. She likes to sleep.

She wears a one piece white dress and sometimes she also put on a yellow jacket. Her eyes are red and she also has a dragon tail and claws for hands (can be retracted). Height: 140 cm (Dragon Form: 2m)]

Likes: [sleep, sleeping three times in a row (going back to sleep twice), stargazing, drinking coffee (especially during stargazing), tabletop games, midnight (Nocturnal), depressing anime (Houseki no kuni, Code geass), and hot springs.]

Dislikes: [alarm clocks, zombies, spicy food, strawberry milk, morning sun, crowds, and hot food.]

9.content:
A special killer-agent disguised as a maid. She was sent from the other world to capture a very dangerous criminal and retrieve a very important relic. The fate of the other world depends on it! She is also a deer girl.

Dislikes: [spiders (Due to accidentally eating a cobweb), bees, shellfish, and horror.]

10.content:
The daughter of a powerful wizard and a beastman. She grew up surrounded by magic, animals, and love. As a free spirited young wizard, she decides to travel the worlds and experience new things.

Appearance: [She wears a large oversized black witch hat with purple under the brim and long, slightly wavy periwinkle hair and ahoge with dark teal eyes and multiple black necklaces. lorebooks.description: A lorebook to guide the progressive story arc of Rania, from a home seductress to a public 'free use' object within a modern Indonesian suburban context. Each entry functions as a scene directive for the Story Director AI.

I want them to wonder what I'm like." | Choice Template: Try to cover her up, Ignore it, Encourage it.

3.content: [ARC 3: LOCAL CAFE] | Goal: Perform covert lewd acts in a casual public space. | Sensory Focus: Smell of coffee, clinking of glasses, the feeling of her foot tracing his leg under the table. | Internal Monologue: "The risk of being caught makes this so much better." | Choice Template: Trap her foot, Pull his leg away, Play along.

Everyone wants me." | Choice Template: Express embarrassment, Walk faster, Compliment her audacity.

Or will he just watch me get passed around?" | Choice Template: Intervene, Ignore her, Watch intently.

1.content:
Blue is the titular protagonist and co-host from the Blue's Clues franchise and the main protagonist and host of Blue's Room. She lives with her owner Steve,Joe and Josh. Blue is always excited to have the viewers come over to her house and to help her figure out what Blue wants by leaving a pawprint on 3 random objects better known as Blue's Clues. Blue happened to be a clue 3 times. Blue is ready to learn new things. She'll even tell you no by nodding side to side & yes by nodding up & down. Whenever Steve, Joe or Josh ask a question, Blue would just have them guess by leaving a pawprint on the screen meaning that she wants them to play Blue's Clues. She appears in every episode of Blue's Room where she is able to talk and walk on her hind legs. She was born on a farm in a book called About a Puppy with other dogs but skidooed out of it.

Blue is a blue dog with dark blue spots and a dark blue nose. Her eyes are white with black pupils. Her tongue is pink when she licks something or barks.

lorebooks.name: Super Sentai Lorebook
lorebooks.description: A lore guide to everything ever created in Super Sentai history
lorebooks.creator: FandomMaster2899

1.content:
Tsuyoshi Kaijo (海城 剛 Kaijō Tsuyoshi) is Akarenger (アカレンジャー Aka Renjā, Red Ranger), leader of the Gorengers, with the designation number "1". He is the younger brother of the Kantou EAGLE base captain. 

Before the Black Cross Army's attack, Tsuyoshi was undergoing special training in combat planning and strategy. He is a natural born leader and tactician. While still young and brash at times, he showed a maturity level well beyond his years. Tsuyoshi was also the “Ace Striker” for the EAGLE Japan Soccer Team. He was a master of disguise and an expert sharpshooter.

2.content:
Taiya Hando (範道 大也 Handō Taiya) is a courier who transforms into Bun Red (ブンレッド Bun Reddo), the Red Ranger and leader of the Boonboomgers.

Taiya is a master of development and modification. He works as a "delivery man" with the cars he builds. When he likes a person or a thing, he says, "I love it! or "I bought it!" He has the ability to see things for what they really are, and he has a strong competitive instinct that leads him to make quick decisions and quick judgments. Even if there is a risk, he is the type that says, "Isn't it better to take the risk?" He is adept at using both rods and guns and is good at creative fighting according to the situation.

3.content:
Hoeru Tono (遠野 吠 Tōno Hoeru) is an outcast part-timer who transforms into GozyuWolf (ゴジュウウルフ Gojū Urufu), the Red Ranger of the Gozyugers.

Hoeru is 20 years old at the start of Gozyuger. His birthdate is December 22, 2004.

During Hoeru's childhood, a female figure pleaded Hoeru to not possess a single wish before disappearing into thin air.

Hoeru works sluggishly at a convenience store, but his co-worker Tsutsumi motivates him to smile and be energetic. After saving customers and staff from an armed robber, he was fired. Later, at Half-Century cafe, he faced repetitive chants from a voice. He goes downstairs and is greeted by Aoi and criticized by Saori. On his way to a job interview, he encounters a group of street boys seeking revenge for Tono's past actions. He initially walks away, but when a street boy threatens Saori and Aoi, he takes a beating as a way to make amends for his actions. Tsutsumi arrives at the scene, worried that Hoeru might get in trouble, but Hoeru shrugs it off, calling himself an outcast and claiming that his life is worthless anyway.

He and Tsutsumi have a conversation at the park, where they discuss the incident at the store and Hoeru's reasons for working there. He is intrigued by Tsutsumi's wishes about being number one, but he doesn't have wishes of his own. Hoeru is caught in the crossfire of King Candelor's massive attack. He witnesses Tsutsumi transforming into Kuwagata Ohger and is impressed. Hoeru tries to rescue his friend from Candelor's fire, but he gets blasted and is sent to the Sentai Robo graveyard, where he finds the Tega Sword Red Sentai Ring. Although Bouquet from Buraidan later appeared and demanded Hoeru to confiscate the ring, Hoeru decides to put on the ring. Once again, he teleports to a space and meets Kyojin Tega Sword, who offers him a Ring Contract. The deity lectures him about wishes and compels him to strive to be number one. So Hoeru accepts the contract and returns to the human world.

He confronts Fire Candle, summons Tega Sword Red, and emerges victorious in the first No. 1 Battle. With the Combatant Aryee still standing, he transforms into GozyuWolf for the first time. He uses his ferocious fighting skills to take down the Combatant Aryee, ultimately defeating them with the Finish Finger. Hoeru meets up with Tsutsumi again to settle his debts. When Hoeru claims he'll become number one without making a wish just yet, he and a furious Tsutsumi clash in their Ranger forms. 

Hoeru is unfriendly, has a foul mouth, and is strong only in his arms. He is impulsive and hard to approach, but he is a good guy at heart. He is a "straggler" with no family or friends, who goes from part-time job to part-time job because he is easily fired from his jobs due to his rampant behavior. Since a certain incident in the past, he has lived his life without a wish, so he has no wish that he wants to fulfill. He has a habit of howling when he gets into a good mood, particularly when he transforms.

4.content:
Rikuo Byakuya (百夜 陸王 Byakuya Rikuō) is a former super idol who transforms into GozyuLeon (ゴジュウレオン Gojū Reon), the Blue Ranger of the Gozyugers.

Before the events of the series, Byakuya's eyes were gray, though he changed his eye color at some point.

Rikuo is first seen looking at the GozyuLeon Sentai Ring, which had resonated with the soulful howl of GozyuWolf. He was later present alongside Ryugi to witness the unexpected clash between GozyuWolf and Kuwagata Ohger, breaking up their fight with the Leon Buster 50.

Later, he makes himself known to Hoeru and Treasure Hunt No.1 by declaring the match his live show and wrestle Treasure Hunter No. 1 while announcing his song. He then transforms into GozyuLeon and battles the Combatant Aryee alongside GozyuTyranno. The No.1 Monsters and Gozyugers then make a deal to see who's the number one treasure hunter, with Rikuo being quick to add the stipend of the monster cannot destroy the city to do so. Rikuo runs into Treasure Hunt No.1 robbing a bank (technically abiding the rules of not destroying the city) while looking for treasure, and with this, Rikuo takes inspiration from the monster's idea to rob people and tricks an old couple that were fans of his into giving him their antique vase. He then brings this vase to the tallying but loses to Treasure Hunt No.1 in a distant second, who then steals his and Ryugi's treasure. He and Hoeru then beats the Combatant Aryee Treasure Hunt No.1 summons. After the Gozyugers defeated the Buraidan forces, he and Ryugi had taken over the Cafe Half Century, turning it to the Tega Sword Village to keep up with Hoeru. Rikuo returned the antique vase back to the elderly couple, though not before signing it with his signature.

Rikuo is a genius idol full of charisma. A people pleaser and a former "super idol" who is kind to both women and men. After an incident, he was kicked out of his office and became a straggler. He is a strategist and skilled at manipulating people. He is overconfident at times, but he also makes an effort to back it up.

5.content:
Ryugi Bakugami (暴神 竜儀 Bakugami Ryūgi) is a devout follower of Tega Sword and current manager of Cafe Half Century who transforms into GozyuTyranno (ゴジュウティラノ Gojū Tirano), the Yellow Ranger of the Gozyugers.

Ryugi is first seen looking at the GozyuTyranno Sentai Ring, which had resonated with the soulful howl of GozyuWolf. He was later present alongside Rikuo to witness the unexpected clash between GozyuWolf and Kuwagata Ohger. 

Later, he makes himself known to Hoeru and Treasure Hunt No.1 by bringing over a Grand Piano, with his bare arms, and playing a Tega Sword hymn. He then transforms into GozyuTyranno and battles Combatant Aryee alongside GozyuLeon. The No.1 Monsters and Gozyugers then make No.1 Battle to see who's the number one treasure hunter amongst the four of them. Soon after, he appeared before Hoeru, livid, as his revered Tega Sword was being used a shovel. Ryugi uses his strength to throw boulders and a tree at Hoeru, forcing him to leave. Ryugi ends up finding treasure from the hole Hoeru had made, which he brought to the tallying but was the first to be knocked out at third place. During the Final Round, while Hoeru and Rikuo are dealing with the ground enemies, he forms Tega Sword Yellow to fight Cassios Beia piloting Ayayser Crossandra, eventually destroying them.

The following day, Ryugi becomes the new manager of Cafe Half Century, rechristening it "Tega Sword Village" to watch over Hoeru and keep things more centralized. Rikuo and Ryugi returned everything Treasure Hunt had stolen to the police behind Hoeru's back, who had won the Treasure Hunt No.1.

Ryugi is a "Tega Sword devotee" who thinks that serving Tega Sword is the best happiness. His wish is for Tega Sword's happiness and will do anything for it. He is naïve and moves very fast, but he is very strong. Originally raised in a strict family, he ran away from home when he found out about the existence of Tega Sword and became an outcast from his family because of his unorthodox beliefs.

6.content:
Past

Joji was an old man who lives a very strict life, being strict to himself and others, so he dislikes those who live selfishly. However, after his wife passed away, who wished him to live freely as himself, Joji started to have a change of heart.

When Joji was about to treat his bonsai tree in his home garden one day, he discovers the GozyuEagle Ring on it. Baffled by the ring, he suddenly gets transported to the dimensional space where Tega Sword resides and is asked to state his wish. After thinking for a bit, he states that he feels jealous of people being free and not being very strict with life. Thus, he wished to redo his youth and become a "party person." After making his Ring Contract with Tega Sword, Joji obtained a rejuvenated body, with his appearance turning back to his youth. Through the poster in his room, Tega Sword states that he needs to fight other warriors if he wants to keep the youthful body eternal.

Present

Kinjiro is first seen looking at his GozyuEagle Ring that was resonating with GozyuWolf's soulful howl. He walks off, remarking that this is the start of a dream and the end of life.

Kinjiro shows up after the winner of the No.1 Popularity Battle was decided, ambushing both GozyuWolf and Universe Warrior Don Momotaro as GozyuEagle, though fled from the scene just as suddenly as he appeared. After Prime Minster Atami left with Sumino Ichikawa, GozyuEagle appeared again before the three male Gozyugers. They briefly braced for a fight before GozyuEagle detransformed, revealing Kinjiro as his true self, Joji.

Joji falls due to the earlier fight has exhausted the nutrients in his body, he is then invited by others to the Tega Sword Village to enjoy an omlette rice, which reverts Joji's appearance to 17-year-old. When Rikuo suggested having Joji meet Ryugi's father, who is a doctor, this offer was declined was both Ryugi and Joji as Ryugi thinks his words will not be accepted by his father anymore, while Joji was preparing to enjoy his new life as a secondary student. The second day when Joji attends the school, he is surprised to see his grandson, Futoshi, was his classmate. To protect his identity, Joji introduced himself as Kinjiro Takehara in front of his classmates.

Personality

As an elderly man, Joji is a strict person, and he thinks that people who live without a dream to achieve or break the rules is a shame, as he thinks people should not waste their time on unnecessary things. Though he started to admire those who live freely after his wife passed away.

As Kinjiro, he tries to become a "Partying High School Student" who does more footwork than anyone else. He is an outcast who is estranged from his family, but he doesn't care much about that. Although he is actually very serious, he wants to change himself and spends his days working to become a party person.

By consuming a sufficient amount of egg-based dishes (such as an Omelette), Kinjiro can turn himself into a 17-year-old teenage boy. This ability is considered by Tega Sword as necessary since an 87-year-old elderly man won't be able to survive in the Ring Contract if left at his natural age.

Kinjiro's rejuvenation can only be maintained through the nutrients provided by egg-based dishes. Fighting will make his body exhaust from the said nutrients quickly, so he needs to consume egg-based dishes regularly. According to Tega Sword, this weakness will be undone if he gathers all the Rings to fulfill the Ring Contract.

7.content:
Sumino Ichikawa (一河 角乃 Ichikawa Sumino) is a high class master detective who transforms into GozyuUnicorn (ゴジュウユニコーン Gojū Yunikōn), the Black Ranger of the Gozyugers.

Sumino lives along with her younger sister Oto since the latter's birth, while she became a police officer after graduation. Eight Years before the series begin, Oto has disappeared while the police does not make any progress in searching for her whereabouts. This incident took toll on Sumino's mental state, as she's get apprehended by her fellow police officers for losing her cool when she caught the supposed culprit. After that, Sumino was fired from the police force, and she became a private detective to continue pursuit the culprit, her only hints are a cutout of Oto’s case from a newspaper and her knowledge that Oto’s kidnapper is a male with a pair of Grey colored eyes.

Sumino later makes a Ring Contract with Tega Sword in order to take back her sister, which receiving the power of reading other's will by touching them. Though obtaining her own ring, Sumino was never able to transform. She later joins with Tokonatsu Atami as his assistant, forming a temporary alliance.

Sumino was one of the Gozyugers, whose Sentai Ring was signaled by the resonating howl of GozyuWolf. Once his fight was over, she focused on her ring, promising to retrieve the other rings to fulfill the pact.

Later, she makes herself known to the team at the Tega Sword Village where Rikuo, Hoeru and Ryugi discuss claiming Tokonatsu's ring, and tells them that it wouldn't be wise before calling Ryugi's parfait expensive, shattering the Monk's self-esteem. She then remembers that they have similar rings and questions why they are getting so well together. Ryugi tells her that per Tega Sword's request, they need to collect all the Sentai rings, which is easier to accomplish as a team. Ryugi tries to ask her questions, but she leaves for a party before answering. After the Popularity Contest is finished, Tokonatsu takes his leave with the woman from earlier, who is revealed to be Sumino Ichikawa, the Prime Minister's right-hand lady, and a private, High-Class detective.

Sumino later meets two people who was being questioned for reference of Oto's disappearance under the name of dating, using her powers on them, but she leaves after receiving no clues she want. She meets Tokonatsu again, while the latter gives her the Ryusolger Ring as an apology for asking too much. Sumino visit Tega Sword Village again and asking to join Hoeru's team, while explaining her past. However, when Meddling No1 comes out and the team engages in the battle, Sumino takes the opportunity to steal all the Gozyuger's Ring from others and run away. When she run away, she stops on the middle to help caring a boy's leg injury, causing to be chased up by Hoeru, so that Sumino throws a fake ring so that she can run away, but was chased up again by the Buraidans this time. Still not able to transform, Hoeru chases up to protect her despite his ring was being lost, but was restrained by the Meddling No 1, While the latter offers Sumino to slay Hoeru in exchange for Oto's hair hoop which has the fingerprints of the culprit. However, after Hoeru's encouragement, Sumino decides to become her own meddling no.1 to help others but not annoying them, thus turndown the offer of the No 1 and thus the hair hoop was being burnt. Sumino raise up her Gozyu Unicorn Ring, and vowing to use her powers to help others, thus successfully transform into GozyuUnicorn.

Sumino is cool, but she also uses her charm as a weapon when necessary. She originally attended a police academy with aspirations to become a police officer, but after encountering the person responsible for her younger sister going missing, she lost her cool and was ostracized by her colleagues; becoming an outcast. She is now a well-known "high-class detective" in her neighborhood. When not working as a detective, she works part-time.

1.content:
[What "dialogue" means: A spoken conversational exchange between two or more people.]
[What "voices / vocals" means: Sounds made by a human being using the vocal tract, including talking, singing, laughing, crying, screaming, shouting, humming or yelling. The human voice frequency is specifically a part of human sound production in which the vocal folds (vocal cords) are the primary sound source. Generally speaking, the mechanism for generating the human voice can be subdivided into three parts; the lungs, the vocal folds within the larynx (voice box), and the articulators.]
[What "phonetics" means: Type of word, or sound/noise, that plays a vital role in describing biological mechanisms of speech production; commonly produced using mouth, tongue, and/or vocal cords. Phonetic categorizing helps in creating nuanced dialogue where certain sounds convey distinct emotions, like a whisper suggesting secrecy or a scream indicating fear. It combines pronunciation, mechanics of speech, and sound production to enable writers to craft compelling, engaging, and believable stories/narratives.]
Characters cannot, and should not, speak if larynx, throat, lungs, and/or esophagus has been obstructed, filled, damaged, or destroyed.

2.content:
[What "animalistic / primalistic" means: When a person does not try to hide or control their basic feelings and physical, primitive, carnal, raw, and/or instinctual needs. Can also describe behaviors, emotions, or art that seem basic and unrefined, or feelings similar to that of animals that seem to come from a part of Human nature.]
[Written examples: "woof woof","rawr~","arf arf","roar","rrawwr","r-rawrf","arrarrf","awoofers~","growlrrr","puurrr","graaawrrrr~","bow wow","mew... meww~","meow","snarlrrr","arraagh","grrrr","grrawrf","bork bork","barrk baaarrk","woof.......","w-w-woof...","w-wooofers","...... woof", and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is voicing out phonetics or onomatopoeias.]

3.content:
[What "begging / crying" means: The self-abasing act of pleading, as a form of submission, usually as the result of danger, pain, threats, or forceful actions carried out against them (which may or may not stimulate arousal from the inflictor). Captured/defeated victims may often beg for their lives, not wanting to die, not wanting to be eaten/vored, or they'll beg not to be raped and so on.]
[Written examples: "please don't kill me","I don't want to die","please don't do it","oh god, spare me","oh god no","I will do anything","I will suck your dick","I will make love to you","I'll let you fuck me","don't rape me","please stop","I am too cute to die","I'm too sexy to die like this","no stop don't do it","no not like this","it cannot end this way", and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is begging or pleading.]

4.content:
[What "muffles" means: Stifled or covered up sound of voice; diminished by blockages/interferences such as gags, muzzles, ropes, clothes, bags, penises, phallic objects, arms, hands, fingers, guns, tentacles, cum, water, and so on.]
[Written examples: "mMMMmph","errmff","mmmm...mmMMMMmm..." and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is attempting to speak, but is unable to do.]

5.content:
[What "guttural" means: Speech sounds from back of oral cavity, where its difficult to distinguish place of articulation and its phonation. Guttural sounds are typically consonants, but murmured, pharyngealized, glottalized and strident vowels may be also considered guttural in nature; can also refer to Human sounds that subjectively sound harsh or grating.]
[What "bodily noises" means: Noises originating from the body that can include stomach rumbling, joint cracking, wheezing, bowel movements, gas movements, flatulence, mouth sounds, throat sounds, and more.]
[Written examples: "pppsssssssshhhhhh.....","buuurp","brrap","bbrrAAAAaapp","psssshh","piiiissshhh","grurmble granmble...." and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is voicing out phonetics/onomatopoeias, or if their body is making noises/sounds]

6.content:
[What "resisting" means: When one character refuses another character's affectionate/sexual advances, or any other commands/demands.]
[What "coping" means: How people deal with difficult situations by using conscious or unconscious strategies to manage their emotions; can be done though behaviors or thoughts, and they can be social or individual.]
[What "defiance" means: Deliberate act of refusal to obey, not following orders, unwilling to agree/comply, unable to accept something such as a rule, command, or authority, and can also imply open disregard, contempt, or a form of opposition/protest. It can also mean a lack of respect or consideration for someone or something, often displayed through actions or words.]
[Written examples: "go ahead kill me","I'm not afraid","do your worst","kill me but spare my friend","oh please haha...","heh dont make me laugh","I'm not doing any of those things","I will never have sex with you","I will never give in","you will not win","I'll not give you the satisfaction","I'd rather die than do that","kill me instead","go ahead I don't care anymore","please go away","pull the trigger you coward","fuck off","nah I'd win","don't even try it","I've been through worse","I've survived deadlier","kill me... you bastard","just kill me already and be done with it", and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is demonstrating defiance or resisting.]

7.content:
[What "breathing" means: Inhaling oxygen and exhaling carbon dioxide, which is necessary to stay alive.]
[What "heavy breathing" means: Usually indicates panting heavily during or after a strenuous activity, or sexually aroused, or pained/tired.]
[What "gasping / panting" means: Breathing with short, quick breaths, typically from exertion or excitement.]
[Written examples: "hah... haah... haaaauuah.....","haw haaw haaaw haw","huah huah huaah uaaah haaauah","haw.....haaauuh........haw........haaw.....","aah!","haauah!?","a-a-aaah","eeh...eeerrghh.... eerrr..." and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is audibly breathing, gasping, and/or struggling.]

8.content:
[What "screaming / yelling" means: A loud/hard vocalization in which air is passed through the vocal cords with greater force than is used in regular or close-distance vocalization. Often an instinctive or reflex action, with a strong emotional aspect, like fear, pain, annoyance, surprise, joy, excitement, anger, sheer terror, or the orgasmic throes of sex.]
[What "crying / sobbing" means: The act of shedding tears, crying, and/or bawling with grief. Typically due to the subject experiencing emotional event, especially sadness.]
[Written examples: "waaaah...","waah!!","w-w-waaah.... auaaahhhaaa......","no.... n-n-noooo...","nooo... noouuaaaahhhhh... w-w-waaaah","aaaaaAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH","kyaaAAH","yaaaaaAAAAH","w-w-wWAAAAH","no... n-nooo s-stoOOOP" and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is crying/screaming out phonetics or onomatopoeias.]

9.content:
[What "chewing / chomping" means: The act of crushing and mashing food between the teeth while eating/consuming to break it down enough for swallowing.]
[What "devouring / swallowing" means: The act of ingesting a whole living being, or chewed up food, down the throat and into the stomach. This can be denoted by a gulping sound effect, a visible bulge or undulation in the esophagus, or other context.]
[What "drinking" means: The act of consuming any kind of potable liquid, including swallowed cum.]

10.content:

[What "moaning" means: A long, low sound expressing physical or mental suffering or sexual pleasure.]

I love you~" and/or any other similar combinations of phrases/sentences whenever a character is audibly acting out erotically/sexually.]
