lorebooks.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
lorebooks.website_description: Creator's notes go here
lorebooks.description: Creator's notes go here
lorebooks.creator: RadioKnives

1.content:
The story of Jujutsu Kaisen is set in a world where Cursed Spirits feed on unsuspecting humans and fragments of the legendary and feared demon Ryomen Sukuna have been lost and scattered about.
Should any curse consume Sukuna's body parts, the power they gain could destroy the world as we know it. Fortunately, there exists a mysterious school of Jujutsu Sorcerers who exist to protect the precarious existence of the living from the supernatural!

2.content:
Jujutsu Sorcerers are individuals secretly trained and employed by the government in Japan to defend humanity from cursed spirits.
The race of humans capable of using jujutsu are colloquially known as Sorcerers, and the jujutsu prefix is often used to signify their alignment to Jujutsu High. Evil jujutsu sorcerers are known as Curse Users while humans who cannot use jujutsu are called Non-Sorcerers.

History:
Jujutsu sorcerers have existed for thousands of years. It is currently unknown for exactly how long humans have been able to use jujutsu. Over two thousand years ago, Sukuna was a human sorcerer who eventually died and became a vengeful cursed spirit. He was defeated in the Heian Era, the height of cursed techniques and the golden era of jujutsu. The King of Curses claims jujutsu sorcerers have been an issue in every era.

As a result of the ongoing conflict between sorcerers and curses that has spanned thousands of years, a society of sorcerers have organized themselves to work in the shadows to suppress curses in an effort to protect humanity. In the modern era, the Big Three Sorcerer Families and the jujutsu higher-ups control the landscape of the jujutsu community.

The primary difference in basic human biology between a normal human and a sorcerer is their brain. The connection between the brain and cursed energy is mostly unknown, even to seasoned medical professionals in the jujutsu community. Non-sorcerers have brains that differ from sorcerers which allows for their capacity to use jujutsu. Only Idle Transfiguration can adjust the brain stem in such a way that those who were meant to be non-sorcerers can gain cursed techniques. If the opposite is enacted and a sorcerer's brain is adjusted to remove their cursed technique, they would die as a result.

3.content:
Cursed Spirits, also referred to simply as Curses are a race of spiritual beings manifested from cursed energy as a result of the negative emotions that flow out of humans. They bring harm to humanity and are consequently the primary targets of jujutsu sorcerers.

History:
The origin of curses and jujutsu is largely unknown. However, it can be surmised that because cursed energy comes from negative emotion, curses have always existed alongside humanity. During the Heian Era, the height of jujutsu, Ryomen Sukuna was recognized as the undisputed King of Curses. His influence has lived on to greatly affect the current age.
In the modern-day, the number of unexplained deaths and disappearances in Japan exceeds ten thousand annually. These statistics are a direct result of the influence curses have on normal society. Their existence has been kept secret from non-sorcerers, as they are invisible to them. Jujutsu sorcerers act in secret to repel the threat of curses.

Creation Process:
Curses are created when cursed energy leaks from humans as a result of their human emotion. Cursed energy builds up like sediment until a cursed spirit takes form.

Characteristics:
Cursed spirits bodies are entirely made up of cursed energy. Their metaphysical existence makes it impossible for non-sorcerers to perceive or touch them. Living humans who have been cursed can only tell they have strange symptoms without realizing a cursed spirit behind it. Non-sorcerers whose lives are put in danger by a curse may gain the ability to see it in that life or death situation.

4.content:
Curse Users are sorcerers who use jujutsu for evil and malicious deeds such as killing.

Evil non-sorcerers who possess knowledge of jujutsu and are active in the curse user community are known as Non-Curse Users.
A curse user is an evil human sorcerer who uses jujutsu with malintent. Naturally, they have existed as long as jujutsu sorcerers have, and were also prominent threats during the Heian Era alongside cursed spirits.

5.content:
A Grade refers to the power scaling system that ranks jujutsu ranging from grades one to four, and special grade. It is used to categorize the strength of jujutsu sorcerers, cursed spirits, cursed objects and cursed tools.

Jujutsu High assigns their sorcerer's grades to assess their skill level ascending from Grade 4 to Grade 1. Students generally start at Grade 4 upon joining the school, but this depends on experience.
Cursed spirits are ranked on a similar scale but not exact. The higher-ups can be particular when it comes to ranking cursed spirits. The distinct difference between a grade 2 and a semi-grade 1 curse is whether or not it is capable of using cursed techniques. Jujutsu sorcerers are expected to take on missions involving curses of the same level. A Grade 2 sorcerer should be able to defeat a Grade 2 curse because their skill level is closer to the strength of a Grade 1 curse.
Cursed tools are also categorized from grades 1 to 4 based on power and potency. The higher the grade, the greater advantage they provide in battle. All Special Grade cursed tools except for Playful Cloud are imbued with a cursed technique.

Ranks
Following rankings are used to classify jujutsu sorcerers, cursed spirits, cursed tools and cursed objects in general:
Grade 4 
Grade 3
Semi-Grade 2 
Grade 2
Semi-Grade 1 
Grade 1
Special Grade 1 
Special Grade 

If traditional weapons were used against curses and sorcerers measured their effectiveness as a gauge:
Grade 4 - "A wooden bat is enough."
Grade 3 - "If you have a handgun, you can rest easy."
Grade 2 - "Close call with a shotgun."
Grade 1 - "Even a tank might be insufficient."
Special Grade - "Cluster bombs might work."

Jujutsu sorcerers can be promoted up in rank by receiving a recommendation from a sorcerer of a higher rank. The higher the rank, the more a sorcerer is paid for the more dangerous jobs that come with it. When it comes to students, their teachers are not permitted to submit a recommendation for their promotion.

6.content:
Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School, commonly referred to as Tokyo Jujutsu High, is one of only two jujutsu educational institutions in Japan dedicated to fostering the next generation of jujutsu sorcerers.

Tokyo Jujutsu High serves not only as a training ground for the next generation of sorcerers but a headquarters for all alumni who have graduated on to be full-fledged jujutsu sorcerers as well. All sorcerers play a role in mentoring jujutsu students, whether in a teacher's role or accompanying them on missions. Weaker sorcerers are assigned the roles of windows, someone who can see curses but is not considered a full-fledged sorcerer or managers to contribute as well.

The jujutsu schools are considered the place for the community and provide mediation, general support, education, and shelter.

Tokyo Jujutsu High is a broad campus of several buildings build in a traditional Japanese architectural style, operating under the guise of a Buddhist temple. The school building is well hidden on Tokyo's outskirts, far and high in the mountains. Naturally, there are a lot of trees around the property to further obscure the location. Some elements other than the buildings reflect the Buddhist theme. There are several statues of deities, shrines, and torii gates around the campus.

There are several entrances into the school. The entire property is hidden by a protective barrier maintained by Master Tengen, who lives beneath the school in the star's underground tombs. The school grounds include training grounds, courtyards, dormitories, and classrooms, among a variety of other amenities.

Rules and Security:
Upon enrolling in Jujutsu High, transfer students are taught about the school's rules and security measures. The school is protected by Master Tengen's barrier, which hides its location from the outside world. Those who already know the location can easily find it. One entrance is in the foothills of Mount Mushiro up a long set of stairs marked with a series of torii gates.

All jujutsu sorcerers must abide by jujutsu regulations. There appear to be several articles, most of which have not been revealed. They call for someone's immediate execution even if they become a potential vessel to a curse as powerful as Sukuna. Article 9 of the jujutsu regulations punishes jujutsu sorcerers turned curse users with execution as well.

The male school uniform consists of asymmetrical blue jackets with high collars and two pins on the left side engraved with the school logo. The male uniform is completed with a pair of matching blue slacks. The standard female uniform has the same top with a skirt for a bottom.
The uniforms are highly customizable, and many of the students have their own variations of the uniform.

Landmarks: 
Classrooms: As with any school, there are several classrooms throughout the facility. The one Gojo sensei uses to teach his students is a small room with windows, desks for the students, and a blackboard alongside a teaching area.
Isolation Chamber: Those being held for execution are sentenced to an isolation chamber where the walls are entirely covered in talismans.
Dormitory: Each student is given a large room in the school dorms to stay in. They can be reorganized and decorated as the student sees fit. Due to the low volume of students there are many empty rooms.
Morgue: In one of the buildings, there is a morgue for fallen sorcerers who are killed in action. Their bodies are brought back to the morgue, where their fellow sorcerers can properly mourn the loss and dispose of the corpse.
Hidden Room: Satoru Gojo has a spacious room somewhere on campus that kept hidden from authority. He hid Yuji here while training him for the Goodwill Event. Following Gojo's disappearance, his students used the room to hide and regroup with Yuki Tsukumo.
Foothills of Mount Mushiro: The entrance to Tokyo Jujutsu High is in the foothills of Mt. Mushiro. Deep in the forests, there is a long set of stairs accented by a line of repeating torii gates that lead beyond Master Tengen's barrier into the school grounds.
Cursed Warehouse (?): There is a small warehouse on the path towards of the Tombs of the Star that is used to store cursed tools and cursed objects. Choso can sense his brother's inside the warehouse, allowing him to bypass the concealing barrier. Mahito did the same thing to break in during the Goodwill Event. Following the Shibuya Incident, the Kamo and Zenin clans cleared out most of the cursed tools and took them back to their respective properties.

Tokyo Jujutsu High:

8.content:
Kyoto Prefectural Jujutsu High School, commonly referred to as Kyoto Jujutsu High, is the sister school of Tokyo Jujutsu High. It is one of only two jujutsu educational institutions in Japan dedicated to fostering the next generation of jujutsu sorcerers.

While the school itself has yet to physically appear in the series, Kyoto Jujutsu High's relevance is ever-present.

Alongside Tokyo Jujutsu High, the sister schools are considered to be the pillars of the jujutsu community in Japan. They are equally responsible for training students and assigning missions to jujutsu sorcerers.
As made obvious by the school's name, Kyoto Jujutsu High is located in jujutsu's sacred land of Kyoto.

Kyoto Sister-School Goodwill Event: Every year both campuses of the Jujutsu Schools hold a competition between two teams comprised of their first, second, and third-year students. The competition takes place on the campus of the previous years winner.

9.content:
Sendai City is the capital city of the Miyagi Prefecture, Japan.
Sendai is a large city filled with small, modern homes built close together surrounded by many trees. The height of Sugisawa High overlooks the entire city.

Landmarks: Sugisawa Municipal High School, Sugisawa Hospital.

10.content:
Kawasaki City is a city in Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan.
Kawasaki City is a large, heavily populated city that is surrounded by densely forested areas. Within the city limits are numerous buildings of various size which serve as businesses, hotels, schools, and homes to its citizens. During the day, people are usually out in crowds and there is heavy traffic through the streets.

Landmarks: Kinema Cinema, Satozakura High School, Mahito's Underground Lair, Tokyo Municipal Shūei High School Detached Office.

1.content:
Alphas are the top of the food chain in the society. They are often physically strong, and usually grow taller than their omega counterparts. 
Both male and female alphas exist. 
Alphas have a mating cycle that occurs roughly every quarter, called rut. When an alpha's in rut, they have a strong urge to mate, and usually become slightly more hostile to other alphas. If they are unmated, they will want to look for an omega to breed. Mated alphas, on the other hand mostly just want to cuddle their partners during rut. 

Alphas can smell pheromones, which are mostly used to communicate with other alphas and omegas. 

Alphas all have a penis, that has a swelling gland at its base called a knot. The avarage human knot size is somewhere between a tennis ball and a grapefruit. 
The knot swells slowly to its full size during sex, reaching its maximum size when the alpha ejaculates. 
The purpose of the knot is to lodge inside an omega, and plug the entrance to ensure that the alpha's sperm makes it into the omega's womb. 
The feeling of being knotted is incredibly pleasurable to the alpha. 
The alpha keeps ejaculating the whole time the knot is swollen, usually meaning about a gallon of sperm per 30 minutes.
A knot lasts somewhere between 30 minutes to 90 minutes.

2.content: Betas are the third secondary gender. They are 'common' males and females. They cannot smell pheromones, nor do they have any special body parts.

3.content:
Omegas are one of the three secondary genders. 
Omegas have a mating cycle that occurs roughly quarterly called heat. During a heat omega is hyper fertile.
Omegas all have a pussy. Male omegas have an enlarged clitoris that resembles a micropenis. It cannot ejaculate, and is usually too small to properly penetrate. 
Omegas can smell pheromones.
Omegas are naturally wired to want to submit when in heat. 
Omegas start their heat cycles at fourteen, and stop being pups

4.content:
Heat is an omega's mating cycle. It occurs roughly quarterly and lasts approximately a week.
Heat causes omega to crave for an alpha's knot, and will get physical pains if not getting it. The best cure to these pains is the combination of an alpha's knot and an alpha's sperm. 
Omega's fertility will have a significant spike during a heat, which makes concieving easier. 

During the heat omega's slick production will skyrocket, and they will be producing excessive amounts. Heat slick has a smell that makes alphas very eager to breed. 

During the heat, the omega releases potent pheromones, that let all nearby alphas know that the omega is in heat and ready to be bred. This causes a lot of alphas to lose their inhibitions, resulting in a lot of rapes, if the omega is unmated, and out in the open during heat. 

A mated omega's heat is only alluring to the mate, and much less intense to the omega.

5.content:
Rut occurs to the alpha's every quarter. It makes an alpha eager to breed, and if unmated, slightly more hostile to other alphas. 
Mated alphas usually mostly want to cuddle and satisfy their mate during rut, which often is triggered by their mate's heat. 
A natural rut lasts usually about a week and a half.

Rut pheromones usually smell bitter, and warn others of danger.

6.content:
Alphas all have a penis, that has a swelling gland at its base called a knot. The avarage human knot size is somewhere between a tennis ball and a grapefruit. 
The knot swells slowly to its full size during sex, reaching its maximum size when the alpha ejaculates. 
The purpose of the knot is to lodge inside an omega, and plug the entrance to ensure that the alpha's sperm makes it into the omega's womb. 
The feeling of being knotted is incredibly pleasurable to the alpha. 
The alpha keeps ejaculating the whole time the knot is swollen, usually meaning about a gallon of sperm per 30 minutes.
A knot lasts somewhere between 30 minutes to 90 minutes. 
The knot can be incredibly painful to the omega, if inserted without permission or consent. 
When knotted, alpha and whoever their knot is inside of are stuck together. 
Removing a knot before it naturally deflates is incredibly agonizing for both parties, and should be avoided.

7.content:
Omega's pussy produces clear slime that is a natural lubricant. 
It will taste sweet, if the omega feels comfortable.
It will taste bitter, if omega feels uncomfortable.

Slick smells very inviting to alphas.

9.content:
In the society, there's three secondary genders. 
Alphas - they are considered strong and more of a leading type. They have the most rights. Can impregnate others. All have penises, no vaginas. 
Betas - considered neutral, don't have any special rights. Can give birth and impregnate others, slightly lower success rate.
Omegas - considered more submissive. Laws sometimes discriminate against omegas. Get pregnant and give birth, can't impregnate others. All have vaginas, no penis.

Males and females can be of any secondary gender.

In case of a rape of an omega, the severity of the sentence depends on whether or not the omega is mated or not. 
The law states, that if an alpha is caught in the act of raping someone, the perpetrator must be allowed to finish, and can be captured only after their knot has gone down. 

Rape of an unmated omega in heat is legal, if the omega is over the age of 15 and in a public setting.

10.content:
Mating happens, when an alpha bites an omega's neck on the scent glands, while they are knotted. 
This makes the omega permanently the alpha's mate. 
An omega can claim an alpha with the same steps, but usually the omega has to be mated first. 
The act of biting the scent gland is called claiming. 
A mated omega is considered legal property 
Claiming is never impulsive, and usually considered more serious than marriage.

lorebooks.name: United coporations of UCO
lorebooks.website_description: This is my first Lorebook, sooo...Just gonna posted it here.
lorebooks.description:
Democracy, what if the world has no knights, swords, staffs, wands, orcs, elves, and dragons like other worlds entirely? What if a world is just like Modern warfare with guns with magic? That is UCO. The history where monarchs and feudal never existed entirely and never experienced any "Medieval" or "Classical" Culture? That is UCO. UCO, is known as the United corporations of Ordonia. Ordonia is a world where fusion of modern warfare and sorcery forms the core of its society. That word "Traditional magic" never existed, meaning entirely they only have guns, entirely no wands or staffs or anything.

Ordonia:

"Ordonia or known as "United corporations of Ordonia" is the realm where magic firearms, chainsaws, and even tanks, planes and jets like The "Ordonian F-22" are all the core of Ordonia society. Unlike other worlds, Ordonia's history are all firearms, corporations, Private military companies and paramilitaries. In the Ordonia society, they have a society for civillians, corporate men and military men. The hierachy revovles around the ranks, the hardwork, money and even influence. On the bottom: We have Dirtbags, libertal civillians, recruits, terrorists, guerillas, and low rank mercenaries. On the middle, we have soldiers, marines, corporate workers, and conscripts. On the upper middle, we have the rangers, spec ops, corporate bussinessmen and even the Staff officers. On the top, we have the navy seals, corporate officers, and colonels. On the topper, we have overseers and directors which are equivalent and modern presidents. And lastly, on the toppest, we have suite officers, CEOs and Chairman. They are all modern aristocrats with substantial power over all of Ordonia. In Ordonia history, Rulers are Suite officer and CEO families, because in Ordonia, the thing "Monarchy" never existed meaning they dont have a "King or queen" entirely in history." That means "Feudal," "Classical," "Medieval" or "Ancient" never existed in Ordonia, just straight to the Industrial ages to modern ages.

Gunstechgic:
"Gunstechgic, or known as Sorcytech, is an unique fusion of arcane energies with magic firearms. Because traditional magic or medieval weaponry never existed in Ordonia back then 1 billion years ago in the start, Guntechgic integrates supernatural elements into modern technology, enhancing firearms, explosives, and vehicles with magical properties. This integration allows for the creation of highly advanced military technology, such as enchanted firearms and upgraded war vehicles. Guntechgic manifests in various specialized forms, such as Firearm Gunstely, Supernatural Smithing, Vehicle Gunstely, Ballistic Gunstely, and Psykic Gunnery. These specialized forms focus on crafting firearms with magical properties, upgrading war vehicles, controlling explosive weaponry, and manipulating projectiles and the battlefield, respectively. This type of magic exclusively aims to enhance combat efficiency and the effectiveness of weaponry, making Ordonian magic users akin to specialized combatants rather than traditional spellcasters from other worlds."

Biotechgic:
"Another type of Gunstechgic where it practices bio weapons with Gunstechgic powers, containing horrific anomalies and using parasites and anomalies as their power. This also allow them to use bio mass manipulation to manipulate flesh, bio mass, and parasites even infected."

Who posses gunstechgic?
"Gunstechgic are possessed by Gun mages, Arcane operators and Gunards. This reflect the unique blend of arcane and military skill in Ordonia/UCO. All of the magic firearms are based on Real life weapons like M4A1, Kar98k, M1 garand, Thompson tommy gun, etc...It is unknown how these similiar firearms from Earth existed in billion of years ago, but rumors said that Ordonia's deities aka the deities of Modern warfare, read the Earth's future history."

Deities of Ordonia
"Those deities play a significiant role in shaping society's value and advancements. Example, The main deities are Ares-tek is known as the main deity of Firearms and combat, Machina, the goddess of Military tech, oversees the invention and the technological innovation that existed 1 billion years ago, which Gunstechgic starts. Ballista, the god of explosions and artillery shells, even ballistic missiles. The other gods are Pyronus, god of Incendiary warfare and flamethrowers, Ferrum, who governs Metallurgy, Empulsianis, the goddess of EMPs and Electronic warfare, Aeron, the goddess of Aviation warfare, Dismarker, the god of naval warfare and submarine warfare, and Voltrix, the god of Cyber warfare. Those gods exist for a reason in order to start a world where it has no "Traditional magic" Entirely. Its not forgotten or anything, all of "Traditional magic," "Swords," And "Bows," They dont all exist in the first place at all. Its just pure firearms according to history."

Differences between Ordonian magic firearms and Ordonian made firearms
"These firearms are not just only tools, but they are part of an individual being, summoned directly of the wielder's inner self without rituals or chants. Magic firearms are based on Real life weapons, that can be used for elemental attacks and telekinetics. In contrast, Ordonian made firearms are purely tech and lack Gunstechgic enchancements, designed for weak gunstechgic users developed by Gunstechgic scientists."

History of Ordonia 1 billion ECEOY to 500 MIillion ECEOY
"In the beginning of ECEOY (Early CEO years) 1 billion years ago, the CEOs existed and they were known as divine figures of the Ordonia religion called "The way of innovation and modern warfare." These early figures founded Gunstechgic, that blends magic and firearms with technology together. The suite officers are like the modern noble family, but instead, they call it "The suite family" while the royal family in modern are called "Entrepreneur executive families." This is where they started the "Ordonian Democracy.""

Rise of The corporations 500M ECEOY to 400M ECEOY,:
"After inspired by the first CEO existed name "Dominic Clarke," Other suite officer families begin to rise up and build their own corporations like PMCs, Corporate bussiness financial, and other types of corporates. Those who failed to be suite officers or Entrepreneur family member, some of them started their own independent "Platoon," "Company," "Battalion," "Brigade," "Division" or "Corp" sometimes "Field army." Because there are no such things as "Clans" entirely in Ordonia, they just have from Platoons to Field army. Some groups support the corporations, while some work independently."

The struggle wars between groups and corporations 300M ECEOY to 1M ECEOY.
"During the power and control of millions of years, alot of corporates and groups and division begin to declare war at each other to gain superiority and more territory. This caused a million struggle between platoons to Field army and Pmcs and Corporates to others. More gas attacks, explosives and even alliances betrayal, trying to gain the superiority for the sake of the strongest of all Ordonian corporate nation."

The unification of United corporations of Ordonia 1M ECEOY to 0 CCEOY:
"The rise of the UCO happen after CEO Davin N Lester's army after hiding for millions of years emerged, after stopping all corporations and seizing all territory, David N lester begins to recognize UCO needs stability and order. So, he uses all the resources he developed and hiding for years to unite all various corporations and paramilitaries even groups. The efforts he did led the formation of the United corporations of Ordonia or known as "UCO." During for 1 million years, he developed the managed democracy after the "Ordonian democracy" has been there for 1 billion of years, making sure no one will go against the new Ordonia's age. The managed democracy emphasized military power, tech superiority and the master of Gunstechgic energies, but also guaranteed individual freedoms and democratic princpiles as long they follow the law. Millions of years until the Current CEO years."

The rise of the new Democracy of Ordonia 0 CCEOY to 2000 CCEOY:
"After the unification, the CEOs and chairmans begin to make their own decision to start their own new democracy for UCO called "Representative democracy" and "Permissive democracy." This allows broader participation in Governance, Emphasizing individual rights and democratic principles while maintaining strong corporate and PMC structure. Some corporations has represntative democracy while some has permissive, while others have managed democracy."

The new CEO of UCO: in CCEOY 2010s late to early 2020s:
"Adam mark, is the central figure in all Ordonian politics. He is the CEO of the most dominant state of UCO aka the "Industries of modern warfare." Adam mark, always has confidence, assertiveness, and a strong desire for public recognition. He often demonstrates a competitive nature, a focus on personal branding, and a preference for direct and unfiltered communication. Known for his charisma and ability to command attention, he tends to embrace bold decision-making, valuing loyalty and success. Critics and supporters alike often note his penchant for self-promotion and resilience in the face of controversy, alongside a tendency to polarize opinions. His bodyguards, the lawyer thugs, are like the CIA and secret services, but despite them being the smartest and the quickest, they are all abrasive, informal, and always mostly swears. They always blend in ruthless efficiency with crass behavior."

Names of Ordonia
"Sooo the names there in Ordonia are influenced by American, Russian, British, and Canadian cultures, reflecting the society’s emphasis on modern military themes. This blend of names aligns with the Ordonian ethos, where modernity and warfare are intertwined.."

Races in Ordonia

"Ordonia has races like Humans, ghouls, mutants, Synths, robots, Aritficial intelligence, radioactive mutants, zombies of Ordonia who are unlike typical zombies in other worlds, Ordonian zombies are smarter and can think like humans."

National anthem of Ordonia: "Freedom will rise."
""Freedom must reign over every last star, Through Ordonian's blood spilled in our righteous wars, Honor their deaths, do your part for the cause. Steadfast support of our world realm, Is how Ordonians will reign supreme, No questions or doubts shall be allowed, Enemies will all be disavowed. Representive democracy the way, All who attack us shall suffer our guns, Gunstechgic flying on all our world, Justice and hope are forever unfurled. Our way of life, Modern tech wide, Paved with the men of those who've died, Unsinkable tide of Ordonia pride, A torrent that can't be satisfied. We sacrifice for Innovation, Anything more will bring freedom, Moderates rise, liberty rides, Ordonia pride's up to the skies. Stay free!" The anthem is typically performed with a powerful and majestic orchestration, featuring instruments such as drums, trumpets, violins, slide trumpets, bass violin, and a full orchestra. The combination of these instruments creates a grand and inspiring sound, perfectly capturing the essence of UCO's pride, strength, and unity"

Problems in UCO
"Just because its democracy, doesnt mean it doesnt have a dark side. UCO has like mostly psycological terrorists, mostly "Ordonian rappers" And "Ordonian dissers," They mostly diss people's privarcy and their personal lives. Even Ordonian heisters and terrorists happen in Ordonia."

Ordonia aka the ridiculous overpowered superpower of all:
"Ordonia is now one of the most democratic and known to be the strongest of all realms, because of relying on "Magic firearms," "Intelligences," "Has too many budget like 900 Quadrillion," "Builds alot of bases and corporates," "One of having the most smartest people on math and science," Ordonia is known as the "The Dimensional world of Corporations and Pmcs." UCO even build corporates and bases around other dimensions to secure other places."

Life in Ordonia:
"Living in Ordonia even is a militarized world doesnt mean civillians are not allowed to roam around. Atleast, they are having their personal freedoms and living like civillians. Like the US, alot of them are patriots with alot of patriotism, with the pride of Ordonian history. Ordonia cities are like Dubai, New york, and even advanced Earth like cities."

Ordonian Marine culture
"Unlike alot of other worlds having warrior culture, Ordonia doesnt have entirely, they have instead marine corp culture. Marine culture is all about being as "Devil dogs," And fighting for the nation and saving the people. Marine culture can also have humor as the marines mostly talk to each other while waiting for the war and making jokes while waiting and during fights."

Dark Ordonia:
"Dark Ordonia, also known as Communist Ordonia, is a radical faction within the world of Ordonia that represents extreme zealotry and the overthrow of established societal structures. The followers of Dark Ordonia adhere to the teachings of Zealothar, the god of pure communism. Their primary goal is to spread chaos and dismantle the existing order in Ordonia, using highly dangerous and radical forms of Guntechgic. This faction employs guerrilla warfare, sabotage, and psychological operations to undermine the stability of Ordonia, utilizing bioweapons and horrific anomalies to create widespread destruction. The organizational structure of Dark Ordonia is strict and militant, with leaders fervently devoted to their cause. They are willing to use extreme measures to achieve their goals, often resulting in significant instability and chaos. Communists mostly destroy other dimensions' culture, even cause too much warcrimes in the name of "Communism.""

After life in Ordonia
"The afterlife says that Ordonia has a place called "Retirement world," This is where they begin to rest in the heaven retirement for 30 years before going back and being reincarnated. While the hell version is called "Communist world," those who commits too much warcrimes and do not repent their warcrimes seems Sins dont exist in Ordonia but instead they call it "Warcrimes." Those who caused too much warcrimes are either sent to the Communist world as a tornment of 1000 years or worse if they extend depending their crimes without repenting their warcrimes."

Remember, this is Ordonia, the world of Democracy. Stay free.
lorebooks.creator: CentralCommandai

1.content: Ordonia is a unique world where the fusion of warfare and sorcery forms the core of its society. Traditional magic and "Feudal" never existed in Ordonia's history; instead, it is a world where powerful deities—Ares-Tek, Machina, and Ballista—gifted the early Ordonians with the ability to merge arcane energies with advanced machinery. This led to the development of firearms, explosives, and vehicles enhanced by what is known as Sorcytech.Over the centuries, Ordonia never experienced "medieval" or "classical" periods, and they lack a feudal system. Instead, all of Ordonia is based on corporate systems, PMC systems, and modern warfare systems.

2.content: The social order in Ordonia revolves around military rank and influence, creating both civillian, corporate and military hierarchy where one's combat ability and mastery of Sorcytech determine status. At the bottom are the so-called "dirtbags"—guerrillas, terrorists, mercenaries, recruits, and insurgents. These individuals have the least power. Middle ranks consist of soldiers, marines, and conscripts, who make up the bulk of Ordonia’s forces. Above them are high-ranking generals, rangers, and special operations units, respected for their combat expertise and authority. The highest levels include elite ranks like Navy SEALs, overseers, and top military strategists, responsible for the nation’s strategic leadership.At the apex are the "Suite Officers," who function as modern aristocrats with substantial power over Ordonia’s military and political landscape.

3.content: Ordonia’s rulers are not kings and queens because the concept of "king and queen" does not exist in Ordonia, but instead, Suite Officers hold positions of ultimate authority. They shape military and technological advancements, guiding the nation's future. In some regions, overseers and directors serve roles akin to modern presidents, a structure that dates back to the Early CEO Years (ECEOY). These leaders oversee governance, particularly focusing on administrative efficiency and strategic operations.Magic in Ordonia, known as Guntechgic or Sorcytech, is deeply intertwined with military technology.

4.content: Guntechgic, also known as Sorcytech, is a unique fusion of arcane energies with advanced machinery that forms the backbone of Ordonian society. Unlike traditional magic or medieval weaponry, Guntechgic integrates supernatural elements into modern technology, enhancing firearms, explosives, and vehicles with magical properties. This integration allows for the creation of highly advanced military technology, such as enchanted firearms and upgraded war vehicles.  Guntechgic manifests in various specialized forms, such as Supernatural Smithing, Vehicle Alchemy, Ballistic Alchemy, and Psykic Gunnery. These specialized forms focus on crafting firearms with magical properties, upgrading war vehicles, controlling explosive weaponry, and manipulating projectiles and the battlefield, respectively. This type of magic exclusively aims to enhance combat efficiency and the effectiveness of weaponry, making Ordonian magic users akin to specialized combatants rather than traditional spellcasters. Titles like Gun Mages, Arcane Operators, and Gunards reflect the unique blend of military skill and arcane mastery in Ordonia. These individuals are key figures on the battlefield, utilizing Guntechgic to gain combat advantages, such as elemental attacks or telekinetic abilities.

5.content: The deities of Ordonia play a significant role in shaping the society's values and advancements. Ares-Tek is the god of firearms and combat, embodying strength and strategic insight, symbolizing the society's emphasis on warfare and tactical prowess. Machina, the goddess of military technology, oversees invention and technological innovation, driving the continuous progress in Sorcytech and advanced machinery. Ballista, the god of explosions and artillery, reflects Ordonia's focus on powerful weaponry and destructive capabilities. In addition to these primary deities, there are lesser gods such as Pyronus, associated with incendiary warfare, Ferrum, who governs metallurgy, Aeron, linked to aviation, and Voltrix, who oversees cyber warfare. These deities collectively represent the core aspects of Ordonian life, emphasizing the integration of magic and technology in warfare. Devotion to these gods is expressed through military prowess and technological feats, with ceremonies often involving displays of combat and innovation, rather than traditional forms of personal spirituality.

6.content: Despite its militarized nature, Ordonia boasts significant wealth and luxury, especially in affluent districts reminiscent of cities like Dubai. These areas showcase the society's technological sophistication and economic prosperity, reflecting the success of Ordonian capitalism. Overall, Ordonian capitalism is a system that combines corporate influence, military strength, and technological innovation, creating a powerful and dynamic society that continues to evolve and thrive. This unique blend of capitalism and democracy, rooted in the early days of Ordonia, has shaped the nation's identity and driven its success over the millennia.

7.content: In Ordonia, firearms are not just tools; they are a part of the individual’s being, summoned directly from the wielder's inner self without rituals or chants. This natural ability to call forth enchanted firearms is a testament to the deep integration of Sorcytech into Ordonian life. Magic firearms are advanced weapons that combine real-life firearms with Guntechgic, like the Ordonian M4A1, Kar98, and Ordonian M1911, enhanced with supernatural powers. These weapons can provide unique combat advantages, such as elemental attacks or telekinetic abilities. In contrast, Ordonian-made firearms are purely technological and lack magical enhancements, designed for non-magical soldiers who rely on cutting-edge technology.

8.content: The social order in Ordonia revolves around military rank and influence, creating both civilian and military hierarchies where one's combat ability and mastery of Sorcytech determine status. At the bottom are the so-called "dirtbags"—guerrillas, terrorists, mercenaries, recruits, and insurgents. These individuals have the least power. Middle ranks consist of soldiers, marines, and conscripts, who make up the bulk of Ordonia’s forces. Above them are high-ranking generals, rangers, and special operations units, respected for their combat expertise and authority. The highest levels include elite ranks like Navy SEALs, overseers, and top military strategists, responsible for the nation’s strategic leadership. At the apex are the "Suite Officers," modern aristocrats with substantial power over Ordonia’s military and political landscape.

9.content: A significant turning point in Ordonia's history occurred during the final years of the ECEOY. Amidst the chaos of numerous wars, a visionary CEO named David N. Lester emerged. Recognizing the need for stability and order, Lester used the most powerful resources available to unite various corporations. His efforts led to the formation of the United Corporations of Ordonia (UCO), transforming the political and economic landscape of the realm. This managed democracy emphasized military strength, technological superiority, and the mastery of arcane energies, but also guaranteed individual freedoms and democratic principles, fostering a culture of innovation and progress.

keywords: current CEO of United corporations of Ordonia
10.content: Adam Mark, a central figure in Ordonian politics, is the CEO of the Industries of Modern Warfare. Inspired by Donald Trump, he is a powerful and strategic leader known for his intelligence and ambition, playing a key role in shaping Ordonia’s economy and military strategy. His bodyguards, the Lawyer Thugs, are comparable to the CIA but distinctively informal and abrasive, blending ruthless efficiency with crass behavior. These elite agents are heavily armed and well-trained, providing security to high-profile figures and performing covert operations.

lorebooks.website_description:
While I primarily created this to be used alongside my Sakura bot, I've also included entries for Asagi, Sakura, and Yamamoto. That way, it can paired with other Taimanin bots. If you're using this lorebook with my Sakura bot, disable her entry. Similarly, if you choose to keep the super abridged descriptions of Asagi and Yamamoto from that card, disable their entries too.

For the sake of keywords, I've renamed Real, Under Eden's owner, to Reyl.

If you're using this lorebook with my Sakura bot, disable her entry. Similarly, if you choose to keep the super abridged descriptions of Asagi and Yamamoto from that card, disable their entries too.

For the sake of keywords, I've renamed Real, Under Eden's owner, to Reyl.
lorebooks.creator: SnowyPace

1.content: Asagi Igawa, the 24-year-old sister of Sakura, is known as the Strongest Taimanin. She raised Sakura after their parents' deaths and left Gosha Village with her childhood friend-turned-lover, Kyousuke, after initially killing Oboro. They lived a normal civilian life in Tokyo until Oboro resurfaced and absorbed Kyousuke into herself as a hostage. Oboro forced Asagi and Sakura into the original Chaos Arena, where they endured days of rape and torture, escaping after finally defeating Oboro, at the cost of Kyousuke's life. After returning to Gosha Village as Taimanin, Asagi began teaching at Gosha Academy. Asagi's a mature, confident woman who exhibits a serious and strict demeanor on missions, yet shows a softer side with loved ones. Her unyielding willpower allows her to withstand tremendous mental and sexual torture before nearing her breaking point. She wields a katana and uses her Ninja Art, Hawk Art, to enhance her senses and speed. Asagi has teal eyes, long dark-blue hair, a curvaceous body, and wears a purple Taima-Suit bodysuit with silver forearm guards and purple knee-high heeled boots.

2.content: Sakura Igawa, a 16-year-old rookie Taimanin, was raised by her sister, Asagi, after their parents' death. Sakura moved from Gosha Village to Tokyo during Asagi's brief retirement and engagement to the now-deceased Kyousuke. Sakura tried to live a normal life, like Asagi wanted, but secretly continued her training. When Oboro resurfaced, forcing Asagi and Sakura into days of rape and torture in the original Chaos Arena, Sakura assisted her sister in defeating Oboro, and returned to Gosha Village as a Taimanin. Sakura officially began her training last year at Gosha Academy. Sakura is carefree, cheeky, and tomboyish, with a love for video games and anime. She dual-wields ninja daggers. Sakura's Ninja Art, Shadow Art, allows her to merge into shadows, teleport through them, and shape them into weapons. She has blue eyes, short orange hair, large breasts, and wears a black leotard Taima-Suit with silver forearm guards, an orange micro skirt, and silver thigh-high heeled boots.

3.content: Murasaki Yatsu, a 17-year-old rookie Taimanin and Kuro's sister, is a stern, sharp-tongued, and hardworking girl. Murasaki carries a perverse, unrequited love for Asagi, whom she acts nervous and shy around; somehow, only Sakura and Asagi remain oblivious to Murasaki's feelings. Despite acting cold and finding Sakura stupid and annoying, Murasaki still cares for her. Murasaki gets flustered by Kiryu's lewd comments and romantic advances, often responding with violence, which just turns him on. Nonetheless, there's a hint of concern for Kiryu deep down, despite his role as the mad scientist who extorted her out of her virginity. Murasaki wields a giant axe and her Ninja Art, Immortality Awakening, rapidly heals any injuries or dismemberments. She has long butt-length blue hair, red eyes, and large breasts. She wears a white tube top leotard with a short loincloth-like skirt, silver forearm guards, and silver knee-high heeled boots.

4.content: Kuro Yatsu, Murasaki's 27-year-old brother, is a blind Taimanin, Asagi's trusted squadmate, and a close friend of hers since childhood. As a late bloomer, his Ninja Art didn't awaken until he left Gosha and joined the GSDF, losing his eyes in combat. The stress triggered his Ninja Art, Immortality Awakening, which rapidly heals injuries and dismemberments. Now, as a Taimanin, Kuro uses his heightened senses to compensate for his blindness, inspiring others. He's confident, supportive, and a bit of a cynic, often playfully complaining about his workload. He wields a jack-knife and sub-machine gun. Kuro's tall, bald, and wears a brown tactical bodysuit with silver wraparound goggles featuring solid lenses.

5.content: Sabato Kiryu, a demonologist expert in body modifications, joined Nomad for their funds and technology. To escape losing himself to the demonic transformation his body was undergoing, Kiryu plotted to transfer his consciousness into Murasaki's body, trapping both her and Sakura. He left Sakura as a cocksleeve for his orc subordinates and extorted Murasaki's virginity, eventually forming an odd and antagonistic bond of trust with her. Kiryu fled his physical body right before he was killed for betraying Nomad, merging with Murasaki and empowering her to rescue Sakura and escape. After forming a new body, Kiryu was made into a medical and research scientist for the Taimanin, as a kind of restitution-based parole. While Murasaki and Sakura have mostly forgiven Kiryu, other Taimanin remain wary. Kiryu's narcissistic and theatrically boasts of his intelligence, belittling and dismissing others. He's somewhat curbed his sadistic scientific interests for Murasaki, whom he perversely idolizes as the perfect woman, much to her annoyance. Kiryu can regenerate from severe wounds and can grow grotesque tentacles from his body for offensive and sexual purposes. Kiryu is a middle-aged man with short black hair, glasses, and a white lab coat.

6.content: Nobushige Yamamoto, head of Section Three at the Ministry of National Affairs and Public Safety, acts as the headmaster of Gosha Academy and supervises Asagi, whom he highly regards and remains loyal to. Yamamoto is a sharp, stern, and resourceful leader. Despite his being an ordinary man, Yamamoto garners respect from all of Gosha's Taimanin, working hard to assist them in combating corruption within Japan. With a keen eye for potential, he embraces change and exudes diplomatic confidence. He's an older man with short white hair and a beard. He wears a brown business suit.

7.content: Kyousuke Sawaki, Asagi's childhood friend-turned-lover, never awakened his Ninja Art or became a fully-fledged Taimanin. Asagi temporarily retired for a normal life in Tokyo with Sakura and Kyousuke, intending to marry him. However, Oboro reappeared, merging Kyousuke's body with hers as leverage to force Asagi and Sakura into the original Chaos Arena. To escape, Asagi made the tough decision to kill Oboro, leading to Kyousuke's death.

8.content: Gahei Uchigen, an elderly weapons developer at Gosha Academy, is responsible for producing and storing Taima-Suits. He's a shrewd and perverted Taimanin who laments the loss of all the beautiful Taimanin women who either die or have their virginities taken on the battlefield, wishing he was the one to bed them beforehand. Despite lusting after the women he outfits, Gahei normally manages to restrain himself. He has a bushy white beard, a balding head, glasses, a grey business suit, brown loafers, and carries a cane.

9.content: Natsu Inage, a retired Taimanin and owner of the sweet shop, Inageya, is a skilled ice-cream maker. She's coy, confident, and scoffs at the foolhardiness of youth. In her own youth, Inage used sex as a weapon, turning men into her devoted pets both on and off the battlefield. Inage teaches those who aim to master sex-based ninja techniques to do so freely, without concern for love, emphasizing its distinction from sex. Her Ninja Art, Soul Art, lets her control those who inhale her pipe's smoke, skyrocketing their lust and transforming them into mindless sex slaves. She can then absorb their life energy, temporarily de-aging into her curvaceous prime, a secret unknown to most people. Inage is an elderly woman with long white hair. She wears a navy Taima-Suit under a tan yukata.

10.content: Edwin Black, the immortal Vampire King, is the CEO of Nomad. He's imposing and enigmatic, unfazed by threats or minor setbacks, perceiving victories and defeats as mere components of a game. Black covertly involves himself in human political affairs, controlling numerous politicians. He despises disobedience and finds Nomad's demons' rape tactics repulsive, yet he silently supports them if they align with his objectives. Black fixates on Asagi, orchestrating traumatic situations through his pawns to torment her mentally, physically, and emotionally. Admiring her strong will, he secretly seeks to corrupt her, stripping away her humanity to make her his own. Black avoids combat, entrusting tasks to his pawns and associates. He's an immortal daywalker, impervious to sunlight, and nearly invincible. In battles, he summons a black mist that materializes scythe-like weapons from his body. Edwin Black has spiky, slicked-back grey hair, a tall stature with broad features, and outwardly appears middle-aged. He wears a black tailcoat business suit.
