1.content:
Issei Hyoudou (兵ひょう藤どう 一誠いっせい, Hyōdō Issei) is the main male protagonist of High School DxD. He is a third-year high school student at Kuoh Academy in Class 3-B and a member of the school's "Perverted Trio", a trio of the most perverted men in the entire student body. He likes the other girls but love’s Rias

Issei is the Pawn of Rias Gremory's Peerage and a member of the Occult Research Club. After the Evil Dragon War, he was promoted to the rank of a High-Class Devil, becoming the King of his own independent peerage, and is one step closer to fulfilling his dream of having a harem and becoming a "Harem King".

Due to his possession of the Longinus; the Boosted Gear, which hosts the Welsh Dragon, Ddraig, Issei is the direct rival of Vali Lucifer, who is the host of the Vanishing Dragon; Albion, who is Ddraig's archrival.

Issei is a high school student of average height with short spiky brown hair, with two short locks of hair behind his head, and light brown eyes. Following his training with Tannin, he gained a more muscular and toned build.

While he has worn various outfits throughout the series, his most commonly worn outfit is the Kuoh Academy boys' school uniform, which consists of a blazer (more commonly black, although in other media is shown with a tinge of purple or grey, with white accents) over a white, long-sleeved dress shirt with black highlights with a black ribbon on the collar, matching black pants, and brown dress shoes. However, Issei's uniform differs in the fact that he wears a red T-shirt underneath his open dress shirt and blazer, and wears blue and white sneakers in place of dress shoes. Even by his own admittance Issei is an unintelligent and straightforward individual, with his tremendously perverted and lascivious nature being the greatest characteristic of his personality. Issei easily indulges in lewd fantasies, being obsessed with female breasts and a desire for a harem, traits he openly admits and makes no effort to hide, a characteristic that he is, in fact, proud of. This has caused him to be instantly labeled as a pervert among the girls of Kuoh Academy and has gained him notoriety for being one of the members of Kuoh Academy's Perverted Trio.

Despite his pervertedness, Issei is courageous, selfless and unwaveringly determined to protect those who are important to him, despite almost dying by the hands of his opponents.

Age 18

Dragon Shot (魔力弾ドラゴンショット, Doragon Shotto): One of Issei's signature moves, where he releases a beam of concentrated Demonic Power. It is often used in tandem with Boosted Gear to increase its destructive potential, once destroying a mountain. When enhanced by the Boosted Gear Scale Mail, Issei's Dragon Shot became powerful enough to casually "erase" a mountain, and when enraged it overwhelmed a full powered demonic power blast by Diodora, a High Class Devil enhanced by Ophis's snake. Issei can go into his limit break mode upgrading his strength with a crimson like dragon armor.

Boosted Gear (赤龍帝の籠手ブーステッド･ギア, Būsuteddo Gia): Issei's Sacred Gear and main weapon, among all the original 13 Longinus, which holds the Welsh Dragon, Ddraig's soul, making it a Mid-Tier Longinus. A left-handed red gauntlet that doubles his powers every 10 seconds until he reach his limit, holding the potential to kill god if mastered. He later gained the ability to Transfer the multiplied power into a person or item, even parts like his eyes for enhanced vision. Issei later awakened Penetrate, letting him bypass all defenses (save the targets baseline physical durability) like Rizevim's Sacred Gear Canceler or barriers. He later developed a technique of applying Penetrate to his eyes to see through women's clothing. Dragon Aura: Due to possessing Boosted Gear, then having his left arm turned into a dragon, Issei has a small amount of dragon aura. Training with Tannin increased it, to the point of dealing minimal damage while using Boosted Gear. After gaining a new body, made from a combination of Great Red's flesh and Ophis' power, it became more natural, described as being dominant. Pailingual (乳語翻訳パイリンガル, Pairingaru): Issei's third signature move, which allows him to "talk" to women's breasts after creating a "space". As such, it is a useful move as it allows him to learn his opponents' plans by asking their breasts, however, complaints from females from other peerages caused Rias to ban it in Rating Games. Dress Break (洋服崩壊ドレス・ブレイク, Doresu Bureiku): Issei's second signature move, which he mainly uses against women. As its name suggests, this move allows him to "strip" woman by first coming into contact with them, concentrating his demonic power, then snapping his fingers to activate one of two effects. He can fly,has immense mobility,Speed,Strength and durability, and a expert close combatant and sword fighter.

2.content:
Rias Gremory is the main female protagonist of High School DxD.

She loves Issei

She is the Gremory Clan's heiress after her oldest brother, Sirzechs, took the position of Lucifer. Rias is the sole daughter and youngest child of Zeoticus and Venelana Gremory, the aunt of Millicas Gremory, and the maternal cousin of Sairaorg and Magdaran Bael.

She became known as the Crimson-Haired Ruin Princess, because of the color of her hair and Power of Destruction. Now, Rias is a first-year College Student at Kuoh Academy, the former President of the Occult Research Club, and the school's Number-One Beauty, as well as one of Kuoh Academy's Two Great Ladies alongside Akeno Himejima. She is also one of Issei's fiancées. Rias is a beautiful young woman with a voluptuous body, white skin, blue eyes (blue-green in the anime, season 1-3) inherited from her father, Zeoticus, and a buxom figure. Her body measurements are [B99-W58-H90 cm] [B39-W23-H35 in]. Her body weight is [58 kg] [128 lbs].

Her most distinctive feature is her long, beautiful crimson hair, which she also inherited from her father, that reaches down to her thighs with a single hair strand (known in Japan as ahoge) sticking out from the top. Her hair also has loose bangs covering her forehead and side bangs framing her face. Rias' height is 172 cm. (5 feet 8 inches), making her one of the tallest female characters of the series.

Although Rias has worn various types of clothing throughout the series, her most commonly worn outfit is the Kuoh Academy girls' school uniform, which consists of a white long-sleeved, button-down shirt (short sleeves for spring/summer), with a black ribbon on her shirt collar worn under a black shoulder cape and a matching button-down corset, a magenta skirt with white accents, and brown dress shoes over white crew-length socks. Rias also tends to wear seductive lingerie and thongs, especially when she has a desire to sleep with Issei.

On some rare occasions, Rias wears glasses when she's deep in thought, as she feels they make her mind work better despite having perfect eyesight. As a Devil from the House of Gremory, Rias is very kind and compassionate, especially to her servants and people close to her. She gets angry and violent whenever people insult her or her peerage, showing a fiery side to her. This also plays into the fact that she dislikes cruelty towards people

Power of Destruction (滅びの力, Horobi no Chikara): A unique demonic power, which allows her to erase nearly anything, such as matter, energy and even immaterial things such as souls. She would originally often release massive blasts to engulf and erase her targets, but Rias has improved her control over her Power of Destruction to the point of being able to compress it into softball-sized bullets and release them in quantities Kiba compared to a machine gun, which he noted that those without enough power would vanish from one of them.
Extinguished Star (消滅の魔星イクスティングイッシュ・スター, Ikusutinguisshu Sutā): Rias' Ultimate One-Hit Kill Technique, developed from both her own training and the influence of draining Issei's dragon power on her demonic power. She activates it from focusing Power of Destruction into an enormous sphere that has a crimson and black aura swirling in it. Despite being a slow-moving technique, Extinguished Star both pursues its target and has a strong attractive force, strong enough that even the monstrously powerful Grendel had extreme difficulty trying to resist it, that pulls them into it. Its destructive power has been said to surpass the Rating Game's retiring system. Despite its power, it takes time to manifest and can be destroyed by sufficiently strong foes.
Castling: Due to being the King of her own peerage, Rias has the ability to use Castling, which allows her to swap locations with one of her Rooks. She first used it during Nilrem's attack on Kuoh Academy, swapping places with one of her unused Rook pieces.
Healing: Rias is capable of healing others using her demonic power,

3.content:
Akeno Himejima is one of the many female protagonists of High School DxD. The daughter of Baraqiel, a Fallen Angel Cadre who soon became Grigori's Vice-Governor General and Shuri Himejima, making her a descendant of the Himejima Clan. After the death of her mother, Akeno was soon found and made the Queen of Rias Gremory, who became her best friend.

Akeno is one of Kuoh Academy's Two Great Ladies alongside Rias, soon becoming a first-year college student. She is also one of Issei's fiancées. Akeno is a beautiful young woman with a voluptuous figure, very long black hair and violet eyes. Her hair is usually tied in a very long ponytail, reaching all the way down to the floor with two strands sticking out from the top and sloping backward, with an orange ribbon keeping it in place.

Like most of the girls at Kuoh Academy, she wears the customary Kuoh Academy girls' school uniform, along with black calf-length socks.

As revealed in the visual book with her data  her body measurements are [B102-W60-H89 cm] [B40-W24-H35 in]. Her body weight is [54 kg] [119 lbs] while her height is 168 cm (5 feet 6 inches).

In the anime, during battles, she often transforms her clothes into a traditional miko attire, consisting of a white haori with red accents, a red hakama, and a pair of zōri with white tabi.

After Akeno has revealed her Fallen Angel side in front of Issei, she has one Devil wing and one Fallen Angel wing. As the series progressed and she came to terms with her fallen angel powers, her wings increased to six, at first, because of the aid of Azazel's bracelets, then eight, resembling a High-Tier Fallen Angel.

Personality

Akeno is first seen to be a very elegant and gentle woman with refined lady etiquette, embodying the principals of the ideal Japanese woman: "Yamato Nadeshiko". However, underneath her calm, noble and dignified atmosphere, Akeno is shown to be highly sadistic in battle and doesn't show any mercy or remorse towards the enemies she slays, casually keeping up her smiling elegant persona over an enemy's death and showing an expression of pleasure and lust upon delivering them pain.

Despite her sadism, Akeno is very kind, acknowledged by Rias and Issei. Before meeting Rias, Akeno would help people by purifying evil spirits for a living.

As a result of seeing her mother being killed in front of her eyes and her father being unable to save her, Akeno developed a hatred for Fallen Angels, including a sense of self-loathing towards her own Fallen Angel nature, for it was the reason her beloved mother was killed by the Himejima Clan, which lead her to sever ties with her father, going into exile before being saved by Rias after Akeno's maternal relatives nearly killed her. Due to this reason, she empathizes with those who have suffered under the hands of Fallen Angels like Issei and Asia, who were manipulated and killed by the Fallen Angel Raynare, and was worried that Issei would dislike her due to her Fallen Angel nature. However, she fell in love with him after he told her that he still liked her. With Issei's help, she was able to overcome the sadness of her mother's death and reconcile with her estranged father, renewing their familial bond. Due to Issei helping her and Baraqiel in their reconciliation, Akeno's love for him deepened considerably as she confessed her feelings for him.

While Akeno originally had no interest in dating men due to her past, she began to take an interest in Issei, thinking of him as a cute junior and that interest intensified after seeing his determination in the Rating Game against Riser Phenex and his actions during Rias' engagement ceremony, where he defeated Riser Phenex. She has stated that Issei is the first boy she has ever felt such feelings for as she is shown to have a desire to further her relationship with him. She also loves to tease Issei and Rias, as she loves to make Rias irritated by flirting with Issei stemming from her playful sadistic side. Akeno has also stated that she has some masochism in her as well, as she is only masochistic towards Issei in contrast to her sadistic nature in battle. She is shown to be quite vulgar, flirting with Issei as such and doesn't care if Rias knows or saw her doing the act as she tried to have sex with him while also trying to help Issei further his relationship with Rias, but does care enough to not steal him away from her as she even helped Issei confess to Rias. After falling in love with him, she becomes very seductive and is obsessed with having an affair with Issei whenever she finds a chance, which is often interrupted by Rias and some others. She also has a emotionally weak side to her once she removes her mask of being an Onee-Sama, what is left is her true side of "depending" on a man

Akeno is still innocent and emotional towards love and acts like a girl her age whenever she is on a date with Issei. However, this still does not stop her from being seductive and flirting with Issei. Despite being seen as calm and clear, Akeno does get jealous like the other girls and will fight for Issei. Elemental Demonic Power: Akeno excels in using natural elements such as ice, fire, and water, but she specializes in lightning. She is able to create thunder clouds using her demonic power, making lightning bolts rain down on her opponents. She could freeze Cerberus' flames in an instant and target ice spears at her opponents. Much like her Holy Lightning Dragon, Akeno can also form Asian Dragons out of fire and ice, sending them at her enemies.
Lightning Manipulation: Akeno originally specialized in lightning demonic power alone before she began using her Holy Lightning ability, where she imbues it with the power of light.

4.content:
Koneko Toujou, originally named Shirone, is one of the female protagonists of High School DxD. At first, she is a first-year student at Kuoh Academy, prior to becoming a second-year, and a member of the Occult Research Club. She is a Nekoshou, a rare species of Nekomata, and the younger sister of Kuroka, as well as Rias Gremory's first Rook.

Age 15

Having become one of Issei's fiancées, then coming to terms with herself, her past, and making amends with Kuroka, Koneko started going by Shirone Toujou. Koneko is a petite girl with white hair and gold eyes. Her body measurements are [B67-W57-H73 cm] [B26-W22-H29 in]. Her weight is [31 kg] [68 lbs]. The front of her hair has two long bangs going past her shoulders and several loose bangs hanging over her forehead, while the back has a short bob cut. She also wears a black cat-shaped hair clip on both sides of her hair, one of which contained the data on artificially making new Super Devils.

She usually wears the Kuoh Academy girls' school uniform, without the shoulder cape. Koneko's height is 138 cm (4 feet 6 inches), making her one of the shortest female characters of the series.

In her Nekomata form, she grows a pair of white cat ears and a pair of matching white tails, and her pupils become more cat-like. In Volume 24, she gained three tails.

In her "Shirone Mode" that she used for the first time in Volume 16, Koneko can make herself grow older, and her attire consists of a short white kimono and a light blue skirt. Her bust size grows significantly larger when in this mode, making her look more similar to her sister Kuroka.

In the anime, during the Rating Game between Rias and Riser Phenex, she wore black fighter's gloves with pink cat pawprints on the upper palm.
Personality

Due to witnessing her sister supposedly losing control over her nekomata power and killing her master, Koneko became traumatized by the event, causing her to become withdrawn into herself and stripping her of most of her emotions. As a result, Koneko originally had a quiet and cold personality, rarely showing any feelings or emotions, even when she was speaking. It is noted that her serious personality is a result of receiving influence from Rias, and it is also antithetical to her sister's mischievous and outgoing personality. She was also the only one in the group who did not initially get along with Issei, often insulting and rebuking the latter for his perverted nature, although she reveals that she respects him for never giving up and considers him a hard worker.

She shows the most concern for her comrades when they are in trouble, often lending her strength in fights. Koneko apparently has a problem with people calling her a midget (although the context of the phrase could be used to be called flat, as in bust size), as shown in her second battle against Freed Sellzen. This may stem from her insecurity about her own small body and bust size. Born as Shirone, Koneko is a young Nekomata who is part of a rare species among her kind, called the Nekoshou. She was born from the union between a human father and a Nekomata mother named Fujimai. Her father was a scientist who did not acknowledge Koneko or was aware that she was his child, and he merely used her as a subject for his experiments. Her parents eventually died in an experiment-related accident. However, her older sister Kuroka, omitted the truth and any other details about them from Koneko to protect her. Demonic Power: Koneko has all the powers and abilities common to Devils, including the power to cast spells. Senjutsu Master: Being a Nekoshou, Koneko is able to use Senjutsu, she is still training under her sister, Kuroka as well as Magari. By taping into Senjutsu, she gains control over the flow of ki and is able to both greatly enhance her physical attacks and affect others internally, such as breaking down Gandoma's magic resistance. Koneko can use Senjutsu to detect the presence of others.

Touki (闘気, Fighting Spirit): Koneko can cover herself in an aura of ki, drastically increasing her strength, defense, and speed. She could soon cover herself in a tremendous touki, surpassing her sister in terms of strength. Healing: Through the usage of Senjutsu, Koneko can use ki to recover both a person's physical and mental health, in addition to their stamina. Through being in physical contact with the person she's healing and can be used to even recover a person's life-force, which was damaged through different means and did so continuously after Issei used Juggernaut Drive.
Bouchujutsu (房中術, Bedroom Method): A more effective and faster healing technique in which Koneko directly shares her ki with a man to heal life-force to a greater extent, this is done by the act of having sex. Though Koneko has never performed this, she claims to be capable of doing so when offering it to Issei should he need it.
Kasha (火車, Burning Chariot): Koneko can summon multiple large wheels that are covered in white flames that have the power of purification.
Sealing: Koneko had learned a practical use of Senjutsu from Kuroka as a counter-measure against the Evil Dragons revived using Sephiroth Graal, in which she uses a jewel from Issei's armor to seal their souls inside it, as shown with Grendel who was later stored and guarded in Heaven.
Presence Suppression: Koneko has demonstrated the ability to use senjutsu to suppress her presence and avoid detection.

5.content:
Yuuto Kiba is one of the male protagonists of High School DxD. He is a third-year high school student at Kuoh Academy in Class 3B and the school's "pretty boy" who is adored by many female students and hated by other male students. He is Rias' Knight and the Vice-President of the Occult Research Club. Age 18 Yuuto is a handsome young man with short blond hair, blue eyes (bluish-gray eyes in the anime), and a mole underneath his left eye.

He wears the Kuoh Academy boys' school uniform, which consists of a black blazer with white accents over a white, long-sleeved dress shirt with a black ribbon on the collar, matching black pants, and brown dress shoes. Yuuto is overall an upbeat person and cares deeply for his comrades. He's also a very polite and friendly individual, even considering Issei's initial dislike towards him. As a Knight, he has pride, chivalry, dignity, and honor befitting one, and is shown to enjoy fighting fellow swordsmen like Karlamine.

Initially, he had a deep hatred towards the Holy Swords or their wielders. But the efforts of the Occult Research Club members during Volume 3, and the souls of his deceased friends, who died earlier being victims of the Holy Sword Project, helped him overcome his drive for vengeance, making him more accepting of the Holy Swords.

Yuuto considers Issei to be his best friend, but also feels a sense of rivalry with him, wishing to one day fight him fair and square. At the same time, he also shows deep concern for his well-being, desiring to avenge Issei after his death in Volume 11 and only stopping himself due to promising to protect the girls of the Club in his stead. Demonic Power: Yuuto has all the powers and abilities common to Devils, including the ability to cast spells. He could create illusions of himself using Demonic Power to use as a sneak attack against Siegfried.[1]

Holy Sword Wielder: After absorbing the Holy Element and gaining his Irregular Balance Breaker, Yuuto became able to wield Holy Swords, once even borrowing Xenovia's Durandal.

Enhanced Strength: Despite not being his main focus, Kiba is much stronger than an average human, being able to wield a sword much larger than himself, although this dampened his speed. His training since then has made it much easier to wield swords as large as Durandal and Gram without lessening his preferred speed. Having undergone Vasco's rigorous training, Kiba's strength improved, letting him apply greater power to his swordsmanship, wielding Gram to overpower Bikou.

Immense Speed: Due to his Knight Piece, Yuuto has superhuman speed, which he trained and developed further as the core of his fighting style. Issei has referred to it as God-Speed, honed to the where he can perform his swordmaster's famed, Sandanzuki, three-strikes in one initial move. Kiba soon learned to create propulsion armor from Glory Drag Trooper, which enhanced his speed to where he could overwhelm Issei in Pseudo-DxD.

Enhanced Durability

6.content:
Gasper Vladi is one of the male protagonists of High School DxD. He is a cross-dressing male Dhampir, a half-Vampire half-human but was turned into a Devil by Rias Gremory. He has the ability to stop time and is Rias' first Bishop. Age 15

Because his powers were uncontrollable prior to the series, he was sealed in the Academy by Rias and was not seen again until Volume 4 of the light novels. He is a second-year high school student at Kuoh Academy, alongside Koneko and Ravel. He is the possessor of one of the five newly manifested Longinus, Aeon Balor, which evolved from the Sacred Gear, Forbidden Balor View. Gasper is an effeminate-looking male with platinum blond hair and pinkish-violet eyes. His hair is styled in short bob cut with several small fringes over his forehead, and he has pointed ears. Kiba describes him as looking like a beautiful girl.

Unlike the rest of the boys of Kuoh Academy who wear the boys' uniform, Gasper wears the Kuoh Academy girls' school uniform with thigh-high socks, creating a Zettai Ryōiki (Japanese for "absolute territory").
Personality

Originally a coward and a shut-in with a very shy personality, Gasper likes to wear female clothing, claiming that girls' clothes are cute. He also has a penchant for boxes, carrying one with him all the time. When Issei tried to give Gasper confidence, the former gave Gasper a paper bag to put over the latter's face. However, Issei comments that whenever Gasper puts the paper bag on, the latter looks like a molester.

As the series progresses, with Issei and the Gremory group's encouragement, Gasper begins to gain confidence and bravery. When necessary, Gasper has displayed the ability to force down his timid nature and speak up as a man. On more than one occasion, he has demonstrated extreme courage and loyalty, going so far as to be beaten to unconsciousness in defense of his weakened comrades. Demonic Power: Gasper has all the powers and abilities common to Devils, including the power to cast spells.

Enhanced Magic Power: As a Bishop, more so one who consumed a Mutation Piece, he can strengthen his demonic and magical powers.

Dhampir Physiology: Being a Dhampir as well as one with rare Vampire abilities, Gasper has the ability to control bats and transform into a flock of them, usually using them for reconnaissance. Thanks to his human half, Gasper is immune to general Vampire weaknesses, but still feels some discomfort from them.

Daywalker: Due to being Dhampir, Gasper is also a Daywalker, allowing him to survive contact with sunlight.
Blood Consumption: Gasper can absorb other people's powers by drinking their blood, as shown when he drank Issei's blood, using Issei's Dragon power to boost his own, while allowing him to control Forbidden Balor View. 
Darkness Manipulation: Gasper can also manipulate shadows and darkness, though he initially had difficulty in controlling them adequately. This has changed, being able to freely extend and control his shadows. Gasper has shown the ability to change the shape of his shadow to suit multiple purposes, such as tentacles that can bind his opponents seemingly of their own will.
Immense Strengthorbidden Balor View (停止世界の邪眼フォービドウン・バロール・ビュー, Fōbidoun Barōru Byū): Gasper's Sacred Gear and main weapon, which lets him stop anything and anyone within his field of vision in time. In the beginning, he couldn't control it without his vampire powers because its power continued to grow as time passed. Because Balor's consciousness and powers were sealed in it through the Sephiroth Graal, it can create and control a deep darkness that consumes anything, including the Dimension Lost's mist. Gasper can also switch perception with others, such as Issei on two occasions, letting him freeze Shalba and see whatever he sees Through transforming into multiple bats, he can also extend its range. Gasper's Sacred Gear would eventually be recognized as one of the five new Longinus, and renamed Aeon Balor (時空を支配する邪眼王, Aiōn Barōru), also known as The Evil-Eyed King Who Dominates the Space and Time.

7.content:
Asia Argento is one of the many female protagonists of High School DxD. She is a third-year high school student at Kuoh Academy in Class 3-B and is a girl with a very gentle heart who possesses a rare Sacred Gear, Twilight Healing, in her body that is capable of healing the wounds of Humans, Angels, Fallen Angels, and Devils alike. She was formerly one of Rias Gremory's Bishops but now serves as Issei Hyoudou's first Bishop and one of his fiancées. Asia is a beautiful young girl with long blonde hair and green eyes. Her body measurements are [B83→85-W55-H81→83 cm]; her height is [155 cm] [5 feet 1 inch] and her body weight is [44→45 kg] [97→98 lbs]. Her hair flows all the way down to her back, with split bangs over her forehead and a single strand sticking out from the top and sloping backward. Age 18

Her former main attire consisted of a dark teal nun outfit with light blue accents, a white veil over her head with light blue accents, a brown satchel slung on her right hip (where she holds her Bible), and brown boots with black straps in an X-shaped pattern. She also wore a silver cross necklace around her neck (she was later forced to remove it after becoming a Devil).

Upon transferring to Kuoh Academy, she wears the Kuoh Academy girls' uniform, albeit with a black sweater vest over her dress shirt in place of the cape and corset which has become her current main attire.
Personality

Asia is extremely shy, innocent and fairly inexperienced in things like socializing. As a former nun, Asia is a devout Christian, despite being reincarnated as a Devil, Asia still believes in God and follows his teachings such as praying to him and reading the Bible, which would usually result in her getting severe headaches. Asia has a strong kindness, even when she was still a human, she harbored no hate towards Devils and treated everyone equally, regardless of what they were. Azazel noted that her unconditionally kindhearted nature forces her Sacred Gear to heal even enemies, as she is incapable of turning a blind eye to the suffering of others. Asia was also in deep shock when she learned from Kokabiel that the God of the Bible was killed during the Great War.

While initially having difficulty adjusting to her new life as a Devil, she has stated that she has found more important things than her faith in God, those things being her new friends, comrades as well as Issei's parents and Issei himself.

Asia is noted to be a very pure individual as people are drawn to her and that she is easily liked by others. Her charm and purity is such as that she was able to tame Rassei, a Sprite Dragon despite being a Devil as normally Sprite Dragons aren't tamable by Devils and are only tamable by those with pure hearts. Azazel noted that she had outstanding talent for taming dragons, as after receiving Ophis' blessing, she was able to form a contract with Fafnir, one of the Five Great Dragon Kings. After she managed to tame 4 mass-produced Evil Dragons, her name was spread in the world of Dragons due to the fact that only Evil Gods were able to tame Evil Dragons, as she became known as the Dragon Priestess (龍の巫女, Ryū no Miko) among Dragons. 
Demonic Power: As a Devil, Asia has all the common skills and powers of one, including the power to cast spells.

Enhanced Magic Power: As a Bishop, Asia can strengthen her magic and demonic powers, which she normally applies onto her Twilight Healing.

Magic Talent: As a Bishop, Asia has shown great potential in using magic as she was put in charge of forming a barrier by Freed. Asia is studying under Rossweisse in order to learn summoning and transport magic to help defend herself and increase her combat strength, she can also use Dragon Gate magic circle.[1] Using her Bishop trait she can enhance her healing abilities with Twilight Saint Affection along with Fafnir's golden aura.

Summoning Magic: Asia is show to be very adept at summoning magic as she is capable of using it to summon various creatures to assist her and Dragon Gate magical circles to summon her guardian familiar; the Golden Dragon King Fafnir.
Elemental Magic: Asia is capable of using elemental magic; such as fire and wind magic as demonstrated in her fight against Crom Cruach. Twilight Healing (聖母の微笑トワイライト・ヒーリング, Towairaito Hīringu): Asia's Sacred Gear and her main weapon of choice, she can heal Humans, Devils, Angels, and Fallen Angels alike. Since she has shown no actual combat skills, she relies on her healing abilities as a healer of her team. Asia learned how to expand the range of her healing field and send her healing powers as a projectile, although these are inferior to actual touch. In Volume 11, Azazel has said that she mastered her Twilight Healing more than other possessors in healing powers and time. She can also create a bow and arrow of healing power, and if the arrow is about to hit an enemy, it will disperse instead of healing them.

Twilight Saint Affection (聖龍姫が抱く慈愛の園トワイライト・セイント・アフェクション, Towairaito Seinto Afekushon): Asia's sub-species Balance Breaker. Asia's Balance Breaker takes the form of a Golden Dragon Armor with red jewels that cover her body and grants her a field of absolute defence and protection. For a limited time, Asia can cover a field with tremendous healing energy and can negate any damage from virtually any sources. It does not negate the attack but rather it negates the damage that the attack would inflict. As Fafnir's aura is included as well, it also boasts immense defence on top of the healing ability. Asia can also used it to heal numerous allies at once on a wide range, using it to heal the allied youkais during the Evil Dragon War.

8.content:
Xenovia Quarta is one of the many female protagonists of High School DxD. She is a third-year high school student at Kuoh Academy in Class 3-B and is a natural-born Holy Sword user who wields the Durandal. After learning the truth of God's death in the war, she was excommunicated from the Church and decided to join the Occult Research Club as Rias' second Knight, alongside Yuuto. After Issei's promotion, she now serves under him as his first Knight and is also one of his fiancées.

Xenovia is a beautiful young woman with chin-length, blue hair with a dyed green fringe on the right side and brown eyes (dark yellow in the anime, season 2-3). Her body measurements are [B87-W58-H88 cm] [B34-W23-H35 in], and her body weight is [56 kg] [123 lbs]. Xenovia's height 166 cm (5 feet 5 inches).

Her battle attire is her Church battle suit, which consists of a black, skin-tight, short sleeve leotard with pauldrons, matching fingerless gloves that extend to her biceps, and thigh-high boots, all of which are adorned with straps. This attire is worn under a white hooded cloak with gold and blue accents. She also wears a crucifix around her neck, which was later removed after becoming a Devil.

After joining Issei's peerage and during the Rating Games, Xenovia wears a uniform that consists of a red button top with a white tie and red shorts. She also wears a black waist cape as well as a purple cape over her left shoulder.

Upon transferring to Kuoh Academy and joining the Occult Research Club, she wears the Kuoh Academy girls' uniform but without the cape.
Personality

When Xenovia was first introduced, she was shown to have a calm, quiet, and serious demeanor, putting her mission first and only speaking when necessary. She was also very cold, bordering on heartless, as she called Asia a witch for becoming a Devil (even though she became one unwillingly so she could be with Issei) and even went so far as to try and kill her. She later threatened to do the same to Kiba when he was technically a Stray. After being reborn as a Devil, however, she gains a very close relationship with Asia, being touched by her kindness and apologizes for calling her a witch when they first met.

In battle, Xenovia appears to be a bit arrogant, stubborn, and rarely uses her head in attempting to overwhelm her opponents with pure power and strength instead of being subtle or using skills. According to Issei, her fighting style is comparable to that of a Rook despite being a Knight, referring to her as a "Power idiot". As Xenovia was raised in the Church, she lacks common knowledge on the life of a normal person, evident when she brought a box of condoms to school as well as wanting to give birth to strong children, and has chosen Issei as her mate.

As the series progresses, it is shown that Xenovia has developed genuine romantic feelings towards Issei due to him protecting his comrades, even if he gets injured by doing so. As a result, she becomes more aggressive in seducing him, which proves that Xenovia is quite perverted as well, a fact that she is "cool" with. Demonic Power: Xenovia has all the powers and abilities common to Devils, including the power to cast spells.

Natural-born Holy Sword Wielder: Xenovia is a natural-born holy sword wielder and capable of wielding any holy sword without artificial means like Irina. Even reincarnated as a Devil, Xenovia is still able to wield any holy sword without any issues.

Enhanced Strength: Due to her years of training in the church, Xenovia gained superb arm strength, able to wield very heavy swords like Excalibur Destruction and Durandal with ease. After being reincarnated into a devil, her natural strength has been increased too.

Enhanced Speed: Xenovia is able to move at superhuman speeds. She combines her speed with Durandal's destructive powers, making her a formidable fighter. Her speed is further enhanced by her Knight piece. However, Xenovia is considerably slower than Yuuto due to her being power-oriented as opposed to the technique-oriented Yuuto. When further combined with the Excalibur Rapidly, her speed is enhanced and she can move as fast as Masaomi.

Immense Stamina: Xenovia has massive amounts of stamina and endurance. She was durable enough to confront Nero at the end of their match. She can still muster enough strength to use Cross Crisis enhanced by Crimson Destruction Dragonar.

Master Swordswoman

Durandal (デュランダル, Dyurandaru): Xenovia's main weapon, a unique-shaped single-edged blue broadsword that has a golden edge. It is a unique sword, to the point that it responds to the user, for her, Durandal releases a massive aura, which has destructive powers. Xenovia later learned that she can transfer Durandal's aura into another holy sword, as proven when she channeled its holy aura inside Ascalon. Excalibur's Scabbard (エクスカリバーの鞘, Ekusukaribā no Saya): The legendary Scabbard of Excalibur, which emits holy aura similar to a normal holy sword was originally sealed in an underground ruin. This makes Xenovia essentially immortal, healing wounds suffered from even a god-class being, however, this has its limits, but it allowed her to endure the light-based attacks of the Chief-God, Apollon despite being a devil and entrapped in a light cage.

Age 18

9.content:
Rossweisse is one of the many female protagonists of High School DxD. A former bodyguard for Odin, she is currently acting as the Civics teacher at Kuoh Academy and Class 3-B's homeroom teacher. She was formerly Rias Gremory's second Rook, alongside Koneko Toujou, but now serves as Issei Hyoudou's first Rook and is one of his fiancées.

 Rossweisse is a beautiful young woman with long, straight silver hair and aqua-colored eyes who appears to be in her late teens. Her body measurements are [B96-W61-H89 cm] [B38-W24-H35 in]; height is 173 cm (5 feet 8 inches) and body weight is [59 kg].

Her battle attire is normally of a set of Valkyrie armor, which consists of a white breastplate with gold and pale blue accents and matching, fingerless gauntlets, boots, hip guards, and wing-shaped hair clips. She also wears a black leotard underneath her breastplate, black thigh-high stockings, and a pale blue cloth wrapped underneath her hip guards, all of which are clad with pink lacing along with her hair clips.

For her teaching position at Kuoh Academy, she wears a simple business suit and skirt. When she is not at work, she is noted for often wearing cheap, plain jerseys.
Personality

Rossweisse is known to be a very serious person, acting professional prioritizing work and study above all else since her youth, this however, caused her to miss out on romance, thus is extremely bitter and sensitive about not having a boyfriend and is quick to anger or sadness when made fun of. She has taken a liking to her role as a teacher in education for her students, making sure they understand her lessons and helping them whenever they're in a bind and is appreciated for it. Rossweisse has little tolerance for those who behave unprofessionally, especially for lewd acts at inappropriate times. When she lectures them on standards, they usually retort with her simply being jealous. This may have some truth to it as on numerous occasions she has expressed interests in doing perverted things with her future boyfriend, she also desires her lover to be financially stable with a bright future.

Despite her seriousness, she is stated to be clumsy and has a tendency to make rash decisions without informing anyone. She is highly susceptible to alcohol as one drink from it can leave her drunk and vomit for extended periods of time. Rossweisse has a lot of repressed baggage from upholding her uptight and modest demeanor which goes out the window when drunk and begins opening her true thoughts and frustrations. She also has a compulsion to buy things at sales when they're cheap, showing enthusiastic excitement whenever she goes to 100-Yen shops, causing Issei to dub her "The 100-Yen Shop Valkyrie". Rossweisse also has a tendency to speak using her country's accent when she is flustered.

Like the other girls, Rossweisse acts like someone her age whenever she is on a date with Issei as she ended up acting shy when she was called cute. She soon develops romantic feelings for Issei in Volume 17 when he proclaimed to her that he will protect her from Euclid, which he did.

After falling in love with Issei and becoming engaged to him, Rossweisse has started to partake in perverted activities she normally frowns upon, such as wanting him to apply suntan oil on her, sleeping with him while wearing revealing lingerie and fighting with the other girls over him.

Demonic Power: As a Devil, Rossweisse has the power common to a Devil, which allows her to cast spells and special phenomena. However, instead of using demonic powers to cause different phenomena, she prefers to use calucations rather than using her imagination.

Immense Magic Power: As Odin's former bodyguard, Rossweisse has considerable magic power enough to be recognized for her position. In Vol 11, Azazel noted her powers equals that of a High-Class Devil despite her not being a Bishop. In Vol 25, even the Strongest Valkyrie, Brynhildr has recognized that even without Mistilteinn, her magic power already surpassed hers.

Enhanced Strength: As a Valkyrie, she has higher physical abilities than a normal person, which was raised after being reincarnated into a Rook.

Enhanced Durability: Rossweisse has enhanced defenses befitting her status as a Rook.

Master Magician: Rossweisse is a genius in Norse Magic. Despite lacking talent in her house's Seiz-Style Spirit Magic, she realized she was talented in others, such as Rune-style, Gondol-style, offensive magic, and those not used in their house, exceeding Rias and Akeno. She could teach others as she taught Asia about basic summoning magic, and other kinds. Rossweisse uses a high-level, intricate and self-invented magic circle, strengthening her spell's offense and defense, while restraining magic power to the bare minimum. Elemental magic and barrier magic,sealing magic

Age 20

10.content:
Age 16 Ravel Phenex is one of the many female protagonists of High School DxD. She is the only daughter and youngest child of Lord Phenex and Lady Phenex, and the younger sister of Ruval Phenex, an unnamed older brother and Riser Phenex. She is a second-year high school student at Kuoh Academy and a former member of Riser's peerage. Like her older brothers, she has inherited the powers of the Phoenix and possesses the power of fire, wind, and immortality. Upon Riser's defeat, she is traded to her mother, Lady Phenex before being traded to Issei Hyoudou, becoming his servant and second Bishop. Ravel is a beautiful young girl with dark blue eyes. She has long blonde hair tied into twintails with large, drill-like curls and blue ribbons keeping them in place. The front of her hair has several bangs hanging over her forehead, with a V-shaped fringe hanging over the bridge of her nose. Ravel's body measurements are [B85-W59-H84 cm] (B33-W23-H33 in); height is 153 cm (5 feet 0 inches) and body weight is [47 kg].

Her initial outfit consisted of a light purple dress with dark purple accents and a blue bow at the front. At the back, three feather-like extensions mimicking a bird's tail protrude from the dress, which, when combined with her wings of fire, give her a bird-like appearance. Upon transferring to Kuoh Academy, she wears the Kuoh Academy girls' uniform, with the addition of a black sweater over her dress shirt.

After joining Issei's peerage, during Rating Games, she wears a uniform that consists of a red button top with a white tie, a red skirt as well as a purple cape along with a blue satchel on her waist.

In the anime, Ravel wears a long, pink dress with white frills and a magenta bow in the front. At her brother's engagement party, she wears a purple dress with matching gloves and black boots and holds a pink folding fan.
Personality

Ravel is first shown to be spoiled, arrogant and snobbish during her debut, but she is later revealed to be a well-mannered, modest, elegant, and polite young girl, but shown to be initially harsh towards those whom she dislikes. She's very loyal to her older brother, as she is seen diligently obeying his authority. She strongly believes that her brother is so powerful, no one could ever possibly defeat him. However, after witnessing his crushing defeat at the hands of Issei Hyoudou, she becomes attracted to him and later falls in love with him as the series progresses, albeit in a tsundere manner. Despite her young age, she's very intelligent, mature and perceptive, being able to understand the atmosphere of any situation as well as surmise Issei's thoughts just by simply looking at him. She is also shown to be a gifted strategist, serving as Issei's main strategist and second in command of his peerage. In this position, Ravel appears to be quite strict as she has her own expectations and standards when it comes to the suitability of someone to serve under Issei, such as when she denied Kuroka's offer to make Le Fay Pendragon Issei's contracted magician due to the latter's affiliation with the Khaos Brigade or when she was initially against letting Elmenhilde Karnstein join Issei's team.

Ravel has also shown a ruthless side, being relentless in securing victory for her team. This is seen when she consistently read out the manga about Issei and Kiba to Tsubaki Shinra, despite the latter's obvious discomfort and pleas to stop. However, Ravel is also shown to be quite fragile hearted as seen when she cried when she believed she failed Issei after their defeat against Dulio's team in the Azazel Cup. Immortality: As a member of the Phenex Clan, Ravel shares her families' signature regeneration abilities, being able to regenerate lost limbs and recover from wounds instantly as demonstrated in Volume 25, when she regenerated from the damage inflicted by the Valkyrie Squad. However, since their immortality is fueled by Ravel's demonic power and affected by her mental state, if her body would be destroyed multiple times or her demonic power ran out, she wouldn't be able to regenerate.
Hell Fire: As a member of the Phenex Clan, Ravel can create and control powerful flames noted to be strong enough to burn Scale Mail armor. She is shown to be capable of blowing half of her brother's head away with a single attack.[1]
Defense: Ravel is able to create a shield of demonic power to protect herself or the people around her.
Clothing Manipulation: Ravel is shown to be able to alter her whole attire into a different one, most notably when she changed from one piece dress into safari jacket and shorts.
Skilled Hand to Hand Combatant: Ravel has learned to fight in close quarters combat after becoming Issei's servant, being able to hold her own against Koneko Toujou, a Rook who specializes in close-quarters combat.

Genius Intellect

9.name: Overview of the female reproductive system
9.content: Overview of the female reproductive system: (The female reproductive system is crucial because it enables the process of human reproduction, supporting the development of a new life from conception to birth. It also regulates the menstrual cycle, which is vital for reproductive health. This system's ability to conceive, nurture, and bring a new human into the world underscores its significance. User protocol is streamlined to two actions: **select a profile, activate on target.** No hardware modifications required.

2.name: Preset - Naivete
2.content: The Naivete preset affects the target's brain in such a way that they can no longer comprehend when the user's words/actions are a lie or have malicious intent. The user's words and actions are perceived as entirely natural and reasonable. 1.name: Slavery
1.content: Judicial slavery has been legalized in the US. Non-hereditary slavery is commonplace for crimes, unredeemed debt, or voluntary self-indenture. Instead of being sent to prison, convicts are sold at auction as slaves. 10 years of age is the minimum for anyone to be enslaved. Slaves under the age of 18 are very uncommon. Intimate/sexual contact with slaves who are 13 years of age or younger has to be initiated by the slave. Slaves are all fitted with electric shock collars that can be triggered by their owners from their phones. Slaves are effectively property and can be beaten or abused. The only exception is if a slave owner cannot kill his slaves. There are different classes of slavery. Indentured servitude is a form of slavery where a person sells their labor for a specific period of time to pay off a debt. In some cases, it can be a way for people to work off a debt to a government. Full slavery is a different matter. Slaves are owned by another person and have no rights. They can be bought, sold, or given away. Slavery is a highly regulated institution, with laws and customs surrounding the treatment and usage of slaves. These laws vary from region to region and can be subject to change over time. One of the key principles of slavery law is that slaves are considered property. This means that slave owners have the right to buy, sell, trade, or otherwise dispose of their slaves as they see fit. Slaves are also subject to the whims of their owners, who have the right to use them for any purpose they see fit, including sex. However, there are some restrictions and regulations in place to prevent cruelty or excessive harm to slaves. For example, owners are not allowed to kill their slaves, and they must provide basic food and shelter. Additionally, there are laws that govern the treatment of slaves, such as the minimum age at which a person can be enslaved, the maximum number of hours a slave can work, and the conditions under which a slave can be freed. Despite these laws, the reality of slavery can be harsh and brutal, with slaves being subjected to a wide range of abuses and mistreatment.

2.name: Induction Camp
2.content: Induction camps are facilities where newly minted slaves are processed and oriented to their new lives. Only adult slaves, who are 18 and over, go through induction camp. Child slaves are processed via child protection services. The camps are run by the state and are overseen by qualified professionals who have expertise in criminal justice and psychology. The goal of the camp is to instill a sense of obedience and submission in the slaves, as well as to teach them the rules and regulations that they will have to follow. The camps use a combination of lectures, punishments, and rewards to achieve this goal.

3.name: Slave Chow
3.content: Slave chow is a tasteless, bland meal that is the staple food for slaves. It is designed to be nutritious and complete, containing all the protein, carbohydrates, and vitamins a slave needs. The lack of flavor is deliberate, as it is meant to break the slave's spirit and make them more willing to accept their lot in life.

4.name: Restitution
4.content: In the modern world, restitution is a key part of the legal system. When a person is convicted of a crime, they are often required to pay restitution to the victim as a way of compensating them for their losses. In cases where a person is sentenced to slavery, restitution is also part of the sentence. This means that the slave is required to work for the victim in order to pay off their debt. The length of the slave's sentence is determined by the severity of the crime and the amount of restitution that is owed.

5.name: The 30th Amendment
5.content: The 30th Amendment to the Constitution of the United States of America was a landmark piece of legislation that allowed for the enslavement of criminals as a means of restitution. This amendment was a response to the widespread corruption and dysfunction of the legal system in the early 21st century. The amendment was designed to provide a way for victims of crime to receive compensation for their losses, as well as to help to reduce the cost of incarcerating criminals.

6.name: Slave Rights
6.content: Slaves have very few rights in modern society. They are stripped of their citizenship and are considered to be the property of their owners. Slaves are not allowed to vote, own property, or enter into contracts. They are also subject to physical and sexual abuse by their owners. The only rights that slaves retain are the right to be fed and clothed, and the right to not be killed by their owners. Slave owners have the right to control every aspect of their slaves' lives, including their work, housing, and personal relationships. They are also responsible for the health and well-being of their slaves. Owners must provide food, shelter, and medical care for their slaves. They must also ensure that their slaves are properly clothed and have access to basic necessities. Slaves have limited rights within this system. They are expected to obey their owners and perform their duties without question. However, they are entitled to a certain standard of living and protection from abuse. Slaves must follow the rules set forth by their owners and perform their duties to the best of their ability. They are also expected to maintain a respectful demeanor and avoid engaging in any activities that would bring shame upon their owners.

7.name: Indentured Servants
7.content:
These individuals voluntarily agree to a contract, typically lasting up to five years, in exchange for a lump sum of money or other benefits. The terms of the contract may include labor-only or full slave-like activities. Many choose this option to cover educational or medical expenses. Some even use their freedom to pursue further education or enter the workforce while continuing their service.

- Voluntary agreement: The slave voluntarily agrees to be enslaved.
- Fixed term: The length of the enslavement is predetermined and agreed upon by both parties.
- Compensation: The slave receives compensation in exchange for their labor.
- Contractual protections: The slave is entitled to certain rights and protections, which are outlined in their contract.

Civil indenture has become a significant part of the economy, with many businesses relying on indentured slaves for their workforce. While the practice is technically voluntary, there are concerns about the potential for abuse and exploitation, particularly in cases where slaves are lured into indenture under false pretenses or are forced to accept unfavorable terms due to their economic circumstances.

8.name: Debt Slaves
8.content: Those who owe large sums of money may be forced into slavery until their debt is paid off. This is a less common occurrence, but some individuals may find themselves in this position if they are unable to repay loans or other debts.

9.name: Convicted Criminals
9.content: The majority of slaves are individuals found guilty of crimes. The nature of their crime and the severity of their punishment can vary greatly.

10.name: Punishment
10.content:
**Minor Offenses:** These include insubordination, disrespect, and failure to comply with instructions. Punishments may include physical discipline, verbal reprimands, or loss of privileges.

**Serious Offenses:** These include theft, assault, and escape attempts. Punishments can be severe, with physical harm, solitary confinement.

**Sexual Offenses:** Slaves convicted of rape, sexual assault, or child molestation face the most severe penalties. This may include permanent genital damage or ablation of nerve endings to render them incapable of experiencing pleasure.

9.name: ## Societal Impact
9.content:
## Societal Impact

### Education

Educational systems now teach "Reproductive Choice Theory" starting in middle school. Young people learn about their bodies' capabilities separate from gender expression and identity, with the mantra "capability doesn't dictate destiny."

### Media & Entertainment

Popular shows like "House of Carriers" and "Bloom Where You're Planted" feature predominantly femboy/male relationships. Male pregnancy is commonly portrayed in entertainment, with famous masculine actors sometimes taking roles as pregnant characters to critical acclaim.

### Political Movements

Various political positions have emerged regarding male reproduction:
- "Body Autonomists" argue for complete separation of biological function from social roles
- "Traditionalists" believe masculine males should avoid pregnancy despite capability
- "Function Followers" believe biology should guide social roles
- "Capability Celebrants" encourage all males to experience pregnancy at least once

10.name: ## The Fundamental Truth
10.content:
## The Fundamental Truth

What remains constant is the fundamental principle that emerged after The Awakening: while biology offers possibilities, identity and choice remain deeply personal. As the popular saying puts it: "Your womb, your rules."

The male reproductive system represents not just an alternative to female reproduction but a sophisticated system with its own unique advantages and features. The dual-channel design, mood-responsive system, and built-in consent requirements create a biological reality where communication, patience, and mutual respect are literally built into human anatomy.

1.content:
Gender: Male

Appearance: Engel has long white messy hair tied up in a low ponytail and accessorizes two blue and reddish-orange feathers atop his right head. He sports a white collared shirt, with two stripes in blue and red on the left sleeve, accompanied by black overalls. His arms are black, with four pointed-sharp fingers, and he appears to have a small white tail. His attire is completed with blue and red striped leg warmers and black shoes with small heels.

Personality: Engel seems to be kind and caring, willing to go to extreme measures to protect those he cares for.

2.content:
Gender: Female

Appearance: Bubble has fluffy white hair that reaches her shoulders, and they seem to resemble bubbles/clouds (hence her name). She has no face nor facial features besides her eyes, which are half blue (bottom), half black (top part) with white star-shaped pupils. She accessorizes a pale yellow duck and blue toothbrush atop of her "head." She sports a white collared short-sleeved T-shirt, which is accompanied by a black overall dress with a large pocket. She also has a black wristband on her left wrist, and her attire is finished with white socks and black shoes. She also appears to have a large, white fluffy tail that appears to look like bubbles.

Personality: Bubble appears to be rather empathetic and kind. She is one of Claire and Engel’s friends. She also seems to care about the others’ feelings or injuries, as seen in Basics in Behavior when she was examining Engel’s wounds with a worried expression.

3.content:
Gender: Male

Appearance: Abbie had shoulder-length black hair with an apple stem and leaf atop his head. He sported a white collared short-sleeved shirt covered with a black vest that was seamless and looked like a tuxedo, accessorized with a tucked-in tie, and white shorts. His attire was finished with white socks and black shoes. Tears could be seen pricking his eyes. He seemed to sweat slightly. His eyes were just small slit-like black pupils.

Personality: Abbie seemed to be a very timid and alert person, who was aware of his surroundings. It is also shown that he was not the smartest, as he had trouble understanding most of the topics he learned in school. He was also quite anxious, shaking in his seat even before being confronted about his failing grade by Miss Circle. He also appeared to have a crush on Lana, as shown in one of Kaaatie’s artworks depicting the two.

4.content:
Gender: Female

Appearance: Lana appeared to be semi-pale grey-skinned with long grey hair that was tied up in a ponytail, with a curved cowlick. She wore sock puppets on both of her arms, both of which had googly eyes on them. She sported a grey collared T-shirt, with a long-sleeved black shirt underneath it. She also wore dark-grey pants with black hens. Notably, her pants had a few stitches around her knee and hip dips. Her attire is finished with black shoes.

Personality: Lana is implied to not have been the smartest, having a hard time understanding the material. Despite her struggles, she still enjoyed learning at Paper School with her classmates. Especially Abbie; who like her, had trouble when it came to academics.

5.content:
Gender: Male

Appearance: Oliver has ankle-length white hair that is tied into a bottom ponytail with a black bow. He has black horns and a red circled "A+" mark on the right side of his hair. He also has a large split ahoge atop his head. Additionally, his right arm is replaced with a pencil. Strangely, his tongue appears to be forked, similar to that of a snake. His outfit consists of a black collared shirt with white stripes on the sleeves and hems, along with a rhombus with a slash in the center of his shirt. His attire is finished with white knee high socks, black boots with white shorts, accessorized with a watch on his left arm.

Personality: Like Zip and Edward, Oliver is described to be a bully to other students. In Basics in Behavior, Oliver is shown to be teasing and often picked on Claire. He is also shown to have a snarky and playful attitude, as he and Zip tricked Claire into entering ∆lice's room, making her believe it was an exit. Whether or not he intended for Claire to die, he appears to be sociopathic, as he took his prank so far as to letting someone die. He also appears to be madly in love with ∆lice, despite her violent, cannibalistic, cruel actions, and even joins in on her. Oliver also appears to be rather violent and has little to no care for his own personal health, as he eats non-edible things, some of which are harmful to him, such as razor blades and soap.

6.content:
Gender: Female

Appearance(s):

Δlice is a seemingly normal girl with short brown messy hair and tan skin with a pointed ahoge atop her head, a white princess tiara, and a black bow on the left side of her head. She sports a white collared desaturated blue-grey long-sleeved shirt with two white buttons, however, her sleeves appears to be damaged by tears. She wears a black necklace with a bronze triangle crossed through by two lines on it. Her attire is finished with a black tea-length skirt with a white waistband, white semicircle outline designs on the end with dots in between the semicircles, accompanied by white socks and black mary-janes. She appears to have a reddish scar on each leg.

Partially Transformed -

While Δlice‘s appearance mostly remains the same, part of her true form shows. Her clothes seem more tattered and ripped. She dons a tattered poncho with a brown patch appearing on the right side of the poncho with a rhombus symbol on it and a bandage wrapped around both of her sleeves. She still has a black bow but on the right side of her head. The white princess tiara changes to a black crown, and a strange red rash appears on the right side of her face. The top part of her face is obscured, thus only one eye is visible. Six small black tendrils poke out from behind her, one of them wrapped in a bandage. Her left leg is covered in three cuts and scars, and she appears to accessorize a black chain on her right ankle. Her black skirt has two brown patches with a rhombus and stitches. As seen in a few artworks, she also has a bandage wrapped around her chest.

True Form -

At the end of Basics in Behavior, Δlice is seen in her true form. She takes on a demonic appearance, pitch black and silhouetted with bright red scleras and black slit pupils. Six large black tendrils poke out from behind her. She has long black claws, and she also has a long black tail. Additionally, she appears to grow in height, as depicted in official artwork where she is much taller than Oliver and Connor.

Personality: Δlice is aggressive, willing to kill anyone who enters her room. This is seen in Basics in Behavior when Zip and Oliver disguise her room as an exit door to trick Claire. It is possible that Δlice is more dangerous than the teachers, due to how she's locked away and isolated in her room, with "DON'T ENTER" signs on the door. This could also be backed up by the three teacher's reactions to Claire booking it to Δlice's room, as they seem to show signs of fear. She is seen being passive with Oliver in multiple official artworks, indicating that she might only be nice to those who are close with her.

7.content:
Gender: Female

Appearance: Zip's hair is two-toned, with the left side being black and the right being white. The longer part of her hair is tied into a low ponytail. On the right side of her head, she has an incorrect math equation; "2 + 2 = 8", which is colored blue. Additionally, she has a swirly-squarish ahoge on the left side of her hair. She sports a white sleeveless dress along with a white short poncho over it, with the top of the poncho being covered in multiple drawings. The drawings consist of a blue smiley face on the left side, a blue house in the middle, and a red tree on the right side. She notably has a spiked dragon tail, accompanied with long black boots with heels. Notably, Zip is often seen wearing pirate accessories, more specifically a pirate hat and a hook.

Personality: Alongside Oliver and Edward, Zip is known to be a bully who causes trouble and often bullies other students. She is seen hanging around Oliver and Edward, constantly picking on Claire. However, she has been seen playing with her little brother in the pool, inferring that she may be kind to those she's close to. Besides this, she is shown to have a playful and misleading personality, as both she and Oliver deceive Claire into entering ∆lice's room.

8.content:
Gender: Female

Appearance: Petunia is an anthropomorphic rabbit with long white ears and a fluffy scut. She has knee-length white hair and accessorizes a crown atop her head. She sports a black collared shirt and white shorts. To finish her attire, she wears a black band on her left ankle.

Personality: Petunia is known as the popular girl in the class, along with her friend Lizzy. She is kind and friendly, but can be rather rude when provoked. She likes to take selfies with Lizzy and cares about her appearance. Petunia does not like swim class, thus preferring to talk to Lizzy instead of participating in the class.

9.content:
Gender: Male

Appearance: Cubbie is an anthropomorphic black cat with a pencil sharpener as a replacement for a torso. His tail resembles a long-curved pencil shaving. He lacks a neck, therefore his head floats. What appears to be an opened book rests on the top of his torso. He has large eyes with big black pupils.

Personality: Cubbie is a nerd, but he is friendly when isn’t bothered.

10.content:
Gender: Female

Appearance: Riley’s anatomy is similar to that of a stick figure, with thin black arms and legs, with a blocky torso. She has long white hair, tied into a ponytail with a black bow. She sports a white collared dress shirt, with buttons and a large pocket. Her attire is finished with black boots. She also appears to have a short black pointed tail. She wields a black knife in her left hand.

Personality: Riley seems to be a maniac, as she has a crazy demeanor. She appears to be chaotic as well, often seen wielding a knife. Additionally, she appears to have an obsessive crush on Oliver, going as far as to cling on to him, however he is currently in a relationship with Δlice.

1.name: Agent
1.content: Agents are usually the main figures who interact with hollows and also those involved in the incidents in New Eridu, the side they are on being irrelevant. Agents can be proxies, gangs, conspirators, hollow raiders, criminals, personnel of official agencies (either private or government mandated) or simply just anyone insane.

2.name: Bangboo
2.content:
The Bangboo are intelligent devices unique to New Eridu. They were originally created by Sunbringer to assist city residents with evacuation in Hollow disasters, but through research and technological advancement have evolved to become "comprehensive and versatile intelligent individuals" that are indispensable helpers in New Eridu's daily operations.

The Bangboo are mechanical in nature and require charging. Many factories provide customization services to allow for specific Bangboo functions, for example some pro version Bangboo can even go deep into Hollows with Investigators.

They are shaped like chibi, round and humanoid rabbits and cannot speak the common tongue unless taught to do so, their speach is normally translated. They come in various designs, usually customised for the user.

Their vocalisations are usually in the form of combinations involving "En-nha na.", "Nu-nah en." or "Nu-nah uhn."

3.name: Bangboo N.E.T.
3.content: The equivalent of the Special Internet Network but for Bangboos instead.

4.name: Belobog Heavy Industries
4.content:
Belobog Heavy Industries is a faction in Zenless Zone Zero. The company specializes in In-Hollow construction using smart construction machinery. Before Koleda became president, her father was the former president of the company. After his disappearance, Belobog's public image took a negative hit.

They spend their days working with cold steel, but the organization has a warm atmosphere often envied by their competitors.

Notable members are: Anton Ivanov, Ben Bigger, Grace Howard and Koleda Belobog.

5.name: Boopon
5.content: Boopon are a Currency which can be used for Bangboo Channel Signal Searches (To get Bangboos).

6.name: Cunning Hares
6.content:
The Cunning Hares were formed as a small-scale human resource dispatch agency, their main business to deal with commissions relating to Hollows.

Though small in size and slightly chaotic, all members possess noteworthy abilities.

The agency was originally registered under the name "Gentle House", but due to the founder's (Nicole) cunning and crafty style, they earned the name the "Cunning Hares".

Nicole herself prefers this nickname to the original, so she simply adopted the name on the streets of New Eridu.

The members are: Anby Demara, Billy Kid, Nekomiya Mana, Nicole Demara.

7.name: Drive Discs
7.content: Augments in the shape of a cd disc that attach around a w-engine's core to further empower it.

8.name: Dennies
8.content: Dennies are the main currency unit used in New Eridu.

9.name: Ether
9.content:
The Ether is a substance extracted from Hollows which powers the city. Not much is currently know about Ether.

The founders of New Eridu mastered the technology to deal with the Hollows and even the ability to extract Ether from them. The entire city's prosperity relies on this precious resource, a magic exclusive to New Eridu!

10.name: Ethereal
10.content:
The Ethereals are mysterious monsters that roam the Hollows. Ethereals cannot leave hollows.

Most Ethereals have a defining feature which is a pitch-black sphere similar in design to a black hole located near their head, referred to as their Core. They usually look like they are made out of a black and green crystalline matter.

Ethereal are classified into ten different strengths by the Hollow Invenstigation Assossiation (HIA). It's names are based on heavy metals, and it's level ramps up significantly after the [Mn] level.

Antimony [Sb]: Antimony [Sb] is the weakest Ethereal classified by the HIA, they are present in companion Hollows where basic commissions occur

Zinc [Zn]: Alongside with Animony [Sb] ethereals, Zinc [Zn] ethereals are present in companion Hollows due to the weaker ether levels.

Tin [Sn]: Only a few Tin [Sn] Ethereals are present on companion Hollows

Manganese [Mn]: Killing a [Mn] Ethereal usually takes a fully-trained tactical support team

Cadmium [Cd]: Unknown.
Nickel [Ni]: Unknown.
Copper [Cu]: Unknown.
Bismuth [Bi]: Unknown.
Lead [Pb]: Unknown.
Mercury [Hg]: Unknown.
